-------------------------------REPORT HELPER QUERY------------------------------------

-- STEP 1: CREATING COMMISSION TARGET TABLE
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_TAR_31MAY25 AS
select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'DD HIT Campaign_27th to 31st May25') and  --#HERE REPORT NAME WILL BE COMMISSOIN REPORT WISE --#
CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'));--106  Rows   --#HERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION WILL BE THE BASE MONTH --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_TAR_31MAY25;--106  Rows  --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#

-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_31MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_31MAY25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_TAR_31MAY25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '31-MAY-25';--553098  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_31MAY25;--553098  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;


-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET_31_MAY25 PURGE;  
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET_31_MAY25 AS  --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_31MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '27-MAY-25' AND '31-MAY-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (709)--# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 709 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date AS PER SRF--#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--335  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--354  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 200 THEN TARGET*2*50   --#COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CAPPED AT 200% AS PER SRF CONDITION
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN HIT*50   --# SLAB WISE COMMISSION IS GIVEN HERE --#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--134  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET_31_MAY25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--310950 TAKA

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET_31_MAY25;--318  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET_31_MAY25;--53400         241835      177710      310950           276220           337595      360780  TK

-------------DETAIL------------
--STEP 7: CREATING 2ND DETAIL TABLE
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET2_31MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET2_31MAY25 AS
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,RETAILER_CODE,RET_MSISDN,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_31MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '27-MAY-25' AND '31-MAY-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (709)--# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 709 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
)
SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--1151  Rows

select * from TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET2_31MAY25;--1151  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET2_31MAY25) --#



---------------------------------REPORT SETUP QUERY--------------------------------------------------
--STEP 8: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING

--REPORT_ID : 7968 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
-- 7968 9954 64514
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'DD HIT Campaign_27th to 31st May25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 9954  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (May_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 64514 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7968 and  CYCLEID = 9954;--64514

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 64514;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 64514;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 64514 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET_31_MAY25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 64514; --53400        241835   TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 64514  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jun_25'; --Publish month --9954
 
--STEP 9: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('DD HIT Campaign_27th to 31st May25',10074,'TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET_31_MAY25','SUMMERY_DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET2_31MAY25','MSISDN_DETAIL');

--STEP 10: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('DD HIT Campaign_27th to 31st May25', 64514,'May_25', 'Jun_25',290, 1);

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------

--# STEP 1: CREATING THE SUPPORTING DATA
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
--drop table DD_19_23_FEB25_62372 purge;
--CREATE TABLE DD_19_23_FEB25_62372 AS
--select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
--WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
--where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Booster_Central Cluster_25th to 31sth Jan25') and  
--CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'));--1278  Rows

SELECT * FROM DD_19_23_FEB25_62372;--238  Rows --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#

UPDATE DD_19_23_FEB25_62372 SET RECHARGE_TARGET = ROUND(RECHARGE_TARGET); --#UPDATING THE TABLE FOR ROUNDING TARGET--#
COMMIT;

--# STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_23FEB25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_23FEB25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN 
FROM DD_19_23_FEB25_62372 TAR 
INNER JOIN AGENT_LIST_DAILY AG ON AG.DIST_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '23-FEB-25';--117982  Rows   --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#   

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_23FEB25;--425194  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_19_23FEB25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_19_23FEB25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.REGION,AG.DD_CODE,AG.RECHARGE_TARGET TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_23FEB25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '19-FEB-25' AND '23-FEB-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN ( --#THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 19-Feb-2025 End Date: 23-Feb-2025 IN THE SRF --#
19,27,34,36,47,48,56,57,58,64,69,77,81,86,96,97,99,104,117,118,127,129,147,148,149,157,
167,169,177,196,197,198,199,207,209,222,224,227,229,247,248,249,296,297,298,299,319,337,348,
396,397,398,399,448,497,498,499,548,549,597,599,649,698,699,798,799,897,899,998,1397
)
    GROUP BY AG.REGION,AG.DD_CODE,  AG.RECHARGE_TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--53  Rows
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--53  Rows
,CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT REGION, SUM(TARGET) REGION_TARGET, SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE) CENTRAL_RECHARGE,ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE)/SUM(TARGET))*100) REGION_ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
GROUP BY REGION
)
--SELECT * FROM CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--358  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER,REGION_ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110 AND REGION_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0010)) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 AND REGION_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0010)) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE DD
    LEFT JOIN CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE CC ON CC.REGION = DD.REGION
    
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--53  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_6_10MAE25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--273873 TK

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_19_23FEB25;--236  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_19_23FEB25;--273873 TK

------------------SETUP-------------
--STEP 12: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING

--REPORT_ID : 7968 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
-- 7657 9754 62834
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_19th to 23rd Feb25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 9754  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 62834 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID)
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7581 and  CYCLEID = 9674;--62372

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62372;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62372;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 62372 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_19_23FEB25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62372; -- 273873 TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 9754  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25'; --base month

--STEP 12: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
--EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_19th to 23rd Feb25',9674,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_19_23FEB25','SUMMARY DETAILS');

 --STEP 13: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
--EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_19th to 23rd Feb25', 62372,'Feb_25', 'Feb_25',290, 1);

(Target will be provided by B2C)Deno: ALL Deno (Deno List will share by B2C)Upon achieving Deno Recharge target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given incentives as per below Slab (Distributor wise Recharge Target will be share by B2C).In Addition: Bonus incentive for DD: if Region achieved 100% Recharge target, then >=100% achiever DD’s will get additional 0.10% bonus incentive on total Recharge amount on top their incentive slab.Example for Additional Bonus incentive Calculation: if DD achieves >=100% target, then DD will get 0.8%+0.10% incentive. for >=110% achievers DD, incentive will be 0.9%+0.10%                                                                       Special SupportEligible DHs: DD’s Bundle booster Phase-1 (1-5 March) Campaign Name “Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_1st to 5th Mar25” campaign achievements is <=90%if these DHs achieve 32% monthly total bundle target by 1-10 March, then 1% incentive will be given on total values. (1st to 10th Mar’25 target will be share by B2C)Special support achiever DHs will not be entitled for Additional Bonus incentive.Note: •	If DHs under the Special Support Scheme fail to achieve 1st to 10th Mar’25 target but achieve 6th to 10th Mar’25 target, they will qualify for the regular incentive modality (0.8% incentive, 0.9% incentive) and Additional Bonus incentive (0.1% incentive).Agent list of 10th Mar’25 will be considered.General mathematical rounding, i.e. below 0.5 will be rounded down and greater than or equal to 0.5 will be rounded up is applicable for achievement calculation.📌 Incentive Structure for DDs & Special Support SchemeEligibility CriteriaAchievement Target (%)Base Incentive (%)Bonus EligibilityTotal Incentive (%)Regular DD -------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------

--# STEP 1: CREATING THE SUPPORTING DATA
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
--drop table DD_6TH_10TH_MAR25_62834 purge;
--CREATE TABLE DD_6TH_10TH_MAR25_62834 AS
--select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
--WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
--where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Booster_Central Cluster_25th to 31sth Jan25') and  
--CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'));--1278  Rows --# WE PROVIDE COMMISSION NAME AND BASE MONTH HERE, AND THEN WE FIND THE TARGET FILE DATA --#

SELECT * FROM DD_6TH_10TH_MAR25_62834;--337  Rows --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#

UPDATE DD_6TH_10TH_MAR25_62834 SET TGT_6TH_10TH_MAR = ROUND(TGT_6TH_10TH_MAR),TGT_1ST_10TH_MAR=round(TGT_1ST_10TH_MAR); --#UPDATING THE TABLE FOR ROUNDING TARGET--#
COMMIT;

--# STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
SELECT * FROM dd_rso_ret_mapping_daily;
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_10MAR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_10MAR25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE 
FROM DD_6TH_10TH_MAR25_62834 TAR 
INNER JOIN dd_rso_ret_mapping_daily AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.D_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '10-MAR-25';--117982  Rows     --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_10MAR25;--560984  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_6_10MAE25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_6_10MAE25 AS  --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED  --#
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.REGION,AG.D_CODE DD_CODE,AG.TGT_6TH_10TH_MAR TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_10MAR25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MOBILE   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '6-MAR-25' AND '10-MAR-25') --#THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 6-Mar-2025  End Date: 10-Mar-2025 IN THE SRF --#
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (             --#DENO OR RECHARGE AMOUNT IS SHARED IN EXECL FOR THE CONDITION Deno: ALL Deno (Deno List will share by B2C) IN THE SRF --#
    19,27,34,36,47,48,56,57,58,64,69,77,81,86,96,97,99,104,117,118,
127,129,137,147,149,157,167,169,177,188,196,197,198,199,207,209,
222,224,227,229,247,248,259,296,297,298,299,307,347,348,396,397,
398,399,448,497,498,499,548,549,597,599,649,698,699,719,797,798,
799,897,899,997,998,1199,1397,1899,1999
    )
    GROUP BY AG.REGION,AG.D_CODE,  AG.TGT_6TH_10TH_MAR
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--334  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--334  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING REGION WISE ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT REGION, SUM(TARGET) REGION_TARGET, SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE) CENTRAL_RECHARGE,ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE)/SUM(TARGET))*100) REGION_ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
GROUP BY REGION
)
--SELECT * FROM CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--22  Rows
-- STEP 6: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER,REGION_ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110 AND REGION_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0010)) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER FOR ADDITIONAL BONUS  AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 AND REGION_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0010))  --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER FOR ADDITIONAL BONUS  AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE DD
    LEFT JOIN CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE CC ON CC.REGION = DD.REGION
    
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--334  Rows  --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_6_10MAE25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--388049 TK

-- STEP 7: CHECKING THE CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_6_10MAE25;--334  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_6_10MAE25;--1276325 TK


-- STEP 8: LOGIC FOR SPECIAL SUPPORT

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_10MAR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_10MAR25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE 
FROM DD_6TH_10TH_MAR25_62834 TAR 
INNER JOIN dd_rso_ret_mapping_daily AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.D_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '10-MAR-25';--117982  Rows  --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_10MAR25; --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#
--Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_1st to 5th Mar25
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_5MAR25;--334  Rows  --#NO NEED TO CREATE THIS TABLE. THIS IS THE ACHIEVMENT TABLE FOR COMMISSION Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_1st to 5th Mar25 --# 


-- STEP 9: SPECIAL SUPPORT QUERY START
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_10MAE25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_10MAE25 AS  --#THIS IS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THE SPECIAL SUPPORT WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.REGION,AG.D_CODE DD_CODE,AG.TGT_1ST_10TH_MAR,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_10MAR25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MOBILE   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-MAR-25' AND '10-MAR-25')  --#THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 6-Mar-2025 ? End Date: 10-Mar-2025 IN THE SRF --#
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (         --#DENO OR RECHARGE AMOUNT IS SHARED IN EXECL FOR THE CONDITION Deno: ALL Deno (Deno List will share by B2C) IN THE SRF --#
    19,27,34,36,47,48,56,57,58,64,69,77,81,86,96,97,99,104,117,118,
127,129,137,147,149,157,167,169,177,188,196,197,198,199,207,209,
222,224,227,229,247,248,259,296,297,298,299,307,347,348,396,397,
398,399,448,497,498,499,548,549,597,599,649,698,699,719,797,798,
799,897,899,997,998,1199,1397,1899,1999
    )
    GROUP BY AG.REGION,AG.D_CODE,  AG.TGT_1ST_10TH_MAR
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--334  Rows
-- STEP 10: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/TGT_1ST_10TH_MAR)*100) ACH_PER_1_10MAR
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--334  Rows
-- STEP 11: CHECKING 90 PERCENT ACH GATE
,ACHIVMENT_PERTICIPATION AS (
SELECT TAR.DD_CODE,ACH.TGT_1ST_10TH_MAR,ACH.TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER_1_10MAR
FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_5MAR25 TAR
LEFT JOIN DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE ACH ON TAR.DD_CODE=ACH.DD_CODE
WHERE TAR.ACH_PER <=90    --# SELECTING ALL DD WHO HAVE AHCHIEVMENT BELOW 90 PERCENCT IN PREVIOUS COMMISSION --#
)
--SELECT * FROM ACHIVMENT_PERTICIPATION;
-- STEP 12: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT FOR SPECIAL SUPPORT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,TGT_1ST_10TH_MAR,TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER_1_10MAR,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER_1_10MAR >= 100 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.01)  --#GIVING Additional Bonus incentive (0.1% incentive). AS PER SRF
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM ACHIVMENT_PERTICIPATION DD
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--156  Rows

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_10MAE25; ---SPECIAL SUPPORT 1-10 MAR 156  Rows  --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR SPECIAL SUPPORT FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_10MAE25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_10MAE25; --454447 TK
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_6_10MAE25; --REGULAR PERTICIPATION 6-10 MAR 334  Rows

-----------FINAL COMMISSION -------------

-- STEP 12: MERGING ALL COMMISSION 
WITH FINAL_COMMISSION AS (
SELECT DD_CODE, COMMISSION FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_10MAE25
UNION ALL
SELECT DD_CODE, COMMISSION FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_6_10MAE25 WHERE DD_CODE NOT IN (SELECT DD_CODE FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_10MAE25 WHERE ACH_PER_1_10MAR >= 100) --178  Rows
)
SELECT * FROM FINAL_COMMISSION; --334  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM FINAL_COMMISSION; --14,51,642


------------------SETUP-------------
--STEP 13: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING

--REPORT_ID : 7968 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
-- 7657 9754 62834
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_6th to 10th Mar25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 9754  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 62834 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7657 and  CYCLEID = 9754;--62834

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62834;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62834;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 62834 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
WITH FINAL_COMMISSION AS (
SELECT DD_CODE, COMMISSION FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_10MAE25
UNION ALL
SELECT DD_CODE, COMMISSION FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_6_10MAE25 WHERE DD_CODE NOT IN (SELECT DD_CODE FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_10MAE25 WHERE ACH_PER_1_10MAR >= 100) --178  Rows
)
SELECT * FROM FINAL_COMMISSION
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62834; -- 1451642 TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 9754  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --Publish month

 
--STEP 14: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
--EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_6th to 10th Mar25',9754,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_10MAE25','SPECIAL SUP DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_6_10MAE25','REGULAR COM DETAIL');

--STEP 15: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
--EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_6th to 10th Mar25', 62834,'Mar_25', 'Mar_25',290, 1);

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
--# STEP 1: CREATING THE SUPPORTING DATA
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
--drop table DD_BOOSTER_10_15_MAY25_64075 purge;
--CREATE TABLE DD_BOOSTER_10_15_MAY25_64075 AS
--select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
--WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
--where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_20th to 24th Mar25') and

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_10_15MAY25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_10_15MAY25 AS
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.D_CODE DD_CODE,AG.SLAB_1_TARGET,AG.SLAB_2_TARGET,AG.SLAB_3_TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_15MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MOBILE   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '10-MAY-25' AND '15-MAY-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN ( --#THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 10-May-2025 End Date: 15-May-2025 IN THE SRF --#
    19,27,32,42,48,57,58,69,74,77,79,81,97,99,104,117,118,
    124,127,129,147,149,167,169,177,197,198,199,207,209,219,
    222,224,227,239,247,249,297,298,299,347,348,349,397,398,
    399,448,449,497,498,499,548,549,629,648,649,719,729,748,
    797,848,849,897,899,997,998,1199,1258,1397,1899,1999
    )
    GROUP BY AG.D_CODE, AG.SLAB_1_TARGET,AG.SLAB_2_TARGET,AG.SLAB_3_TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;-- 328  Rows
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,
ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/SLAB_1_TARGET)*100) ACH_PER_1,
ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/SLAB_2_TARGET)*100) ACH_PER_2,
ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/SLAB_3_TARGET)*100) ACH_PER_3
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 328  Rows
--,CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
--SELECT CLUSTER_NAME, 
--SUM(SLAB_1_TARGET) CLUSTER_TARGET_1,
--SUM(SLAB_2_TARGET) CLUSTER_TARGET_2, 
--SUM(SLAB_3_TARGET) CLUSTER_TARGET_3, 
--SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE) CENTRAL_RECHARGE,
--ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE)/SUM(SLAB_1_TARGET))*100) CLUSTER_ACH_PER_1,
--ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE)/SUM(SLAB_2_TARGET))*100) CLUSTER_ACH_PER_2,
--ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE)/SUM(SLAB_3_TARGET))*100) CLUSTER_ACH_PER_3
--FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
--GROUP BY CLUSTER_NAME
--)
--SELECT * FROM CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--22  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,SLAB_3_TARGET,SLAB_2_TARGET, SLAB_1_TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER_3,ACH_PER_2,ACH_PER_1,
    CASE
--        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_3_TARGET AND CLUSTER_ACH_PER_1 >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0010))
        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_3_TARGET THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
--        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_2_TARGET AND CLUSTER_ACH_PER_2 >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0010))
        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_2_TARGET THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
--        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_1_TARGET AND CLUSTER_ACH_PER_3 >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.007)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0010))
        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_1_TARGET THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.007) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE DD
--    LEFT JOIN CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE CC ON CC.CLUSTER_NAME = DD.CLUSTER_NAME  
)

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------

--# STEP 1: CREATING THE SUPPORTING DATA

--where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Booster_1st to 5th Jun25') and  
--CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jun_25'));--10  Rows

UPDATE TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_5JUN25 SET DD_CODE = TRIM(DD_CODE), SLAB_1_TARGET = ROUND(SLAB_1_TARGET), SLAB_2_TARGET = ROUND(SLAB_2_TARGET), SLAB_3_TARGET = ROUND(SLAB_3_TARGET);
COMMIT;

--# STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_5JUN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_5JUN25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_5JUN25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '5-JUN-25';--145806  Rows

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_5JUN25;-- 145806  Rows


CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_EV_RECHARGE_5JUN25 AS
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY WHERE TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '1-JUN-25' AND '5-JUN-25';

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_5JUN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_5JUN25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 

    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME, REGION,DD_CODE,SLAB_1_TARGET, SLAB_2_TARGET, SLAB_3_TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM (
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME, REGION,AG.DD_CODE,SLAB_1_TARGET, SLAB_2_TARGET, SLAB_3_TARGET,RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_5JUN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_EV_RECHARGE_5JUN25 EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-JUN-25' AND '5-JUN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (19,27,32,42,48,57,58,69,74,77,79,81,97,99,104,117,118,124,127,129,147,149,167,169,177,197,198,199,207,209,219,222,224,227,239,247,249,297,298,299,347,348,349,397,398,399,448,449,497,498,
    499,548,549,629,648,649,719,729,748,797,848,849,897,899,997,998,1199,1258,1397,1899,1999)
    AND REGION NOT IN ('Gazipur') --#THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 1-Jun-2025 End Date: 5-Jun-2025 FOR NOT IN Gazipur IN THE SRF --#
  
    
    UNION ALL 
    
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME, REGION,AG.DD_CODE,SLAB_1_TARGET, SLAB_2_TARGET, SLAB_3_TARGET, RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_5JUN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_EV_RECHARGE_5JUN25 EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '2-JUN-25' AND '5-JUN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (19,27,32,42,48,57,58,69,74,77,79,81,97,99,104,117,118,124,127,129,147,149,167,169,177,197,198,199,207,209,219,222,224,227,239,247,249,297,298,299,347,348,349,397,398,399,448,449,497,498,
    499,548,549,629,648,649,719,729,748,797,848,849,897,899,997,998,1199,1258,1397,1899,1999)
    AND REGION IN ('Gazipur') --#THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 1-Jun-2025 End Date: 5-Jun-2025 FOR Gazipur THE SRF --#
    )
    GROUP BY CLUSTER_NAME, REGION,DD_CODE, SLAB_1_TARGET, SLAB_2_TARGET, SLAB_3_TARGET
    
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--63  Rows
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/SLAB_1_TARGET)*100) SLAB_1_ACH_PER, ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/SLAB_2_TARGET)*100) SLAB_2_ACH_PER, ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/SLAB_3_TARGET)*100) SLAB_3_ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--63  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD.*,
    CASE
        WHEN  SLAB_3_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  SLAB_2_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  SLAB_1_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.007) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE DD
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--322  Rows  --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_5JUN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--337595 TAKA

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_5JUN25;--63  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_5JUN25;--418491           337595      360780  TK

WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 

    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME, REGION,AG.DD_CODE,SLAB_1_TARGET, SLAB_2_TARGET, SLAB_3_TARGET,RECHARGE_AMOUNT,TOP_UP_DATE,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_5JUN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_EV_RECHARGE_5JUN25 EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-JUN-25' AND '5-JUN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (19,27,32,42,48,57,58,69,74,77,79,81,97,99,104,117,118,124,127,129,147,149,167,169,177,197,198,199,207,209,219,222,224,227,239,247,249,297,298,299,347,348,349,397,398,399,448,449,497,498,
    499,548,549,629,648,649,719,729,748,797,848,849,897,899,997,998,1199,1258,1397,1899,1999)
    AND REGION NOT IN ('Gazipur')
  
    
    UNION ALL 
    
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME, REGION,AG.DD_CODE,SLAB_1_TARGET, SLAB_2_TARGET, SLAB_3_TARGET, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,TOP_UP_DATE,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_5JUN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_EV_RECHARGE_5JUN25 EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '2-JUN-25' AND '5-JUN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (19,27,32,42,48,57,58,69,74,77,79,81,97,99,104,117,118,124,127,129,147,149,167,169,177,197,198,199,207,209,219,222,224,227,239,247,249,297,298,299,347,348,349,397,398,399,448,449,497,498,
    499,548,549,629,648,649,719,729,748,797,848,849,897,899,997,998,1199,1258,1397,1899,1999)
    AND REGION IN ('Gazipur')
)

 --STEP 12: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
--# STEP 1: CREATING THE SUPPORTING DATA
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
--drop table TEMP_DD_1_8_MAY25_63897 purge;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_DD_1_8_MAY25_63897 AS
--select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
--WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
--where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Booster Campaign_20th to 24th Mar25') and  
--CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'));--1278  Rows

SELECT * FROM TEMP_DD_1_8_MAY25_63897; -- 333  Rows --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#
SELECT * FROM DD_BOS_1ST_8TH_MAY25_63897; -- 333  Rows
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_DD_1_8_MAY25_63897 AS
SELECT CLUSTER_NAME,REGION,D_CODE DD_CODE,SLAB_1_TGT SLAB_1_TARGET,SLAB_2_TGT SLAB_2_TARGET,SLAB_3_TGT SLAB_3_TARGET FROM DD_BOS_1ST_8TH_MAY25_63897;


--UPDATE TEMP_DD_1_8_MAY25_63897 SET DD_CODE = trim(DD_CODE), SLAB_1_TARGET = ROUND(SLAB_1_TARGET),SLAB_2_TARGET = ROUND(SLAB_2_TARGET),SLAB_3_TARGET = ROUND(SLAB_3_TARGET);
--COMMIT;

--# STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST
SELECT * FROM dd_rso_ret_mapping_daily;
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_8MAY25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_8MAY25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE 
FROM TEMP_DD_1_8_MAY25_63897 TAR 
INNER JOIN dd_rso_ret_mapping_daily AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '8-MAY-25';--117982  Rows     

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_8MAY25;-- 555485  Rows

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_8MAY25 PURGE; 
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_8MAY25 AS -- #THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.CLUSTER_NAME,AG.REGION,AG.DD_CODE,AG.SLAB_1_TARGET,AG.SLAB_2_TARGET,AG.SLAB_3_TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_8MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MOBILE   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-MAY-25' AND '8-MAY-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN ( --#THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 1-May-2025 End Date: 8-May-2025 IN THE SRF --#
    32,42,69,74,79,124,209,219,239,249,349,449,629,648,729,748,
    848,1258,48,81,104,222,224,19,57,58,97,117,147,149,167,169,199,
    297,347,348,399,448,497,499,649,849,998,27,77,99,118,127,129,
    177,197,198,207,227,247,298,299,397,398,498,548,549,719,797,
    897,899,997,1199,1397,1899,1999
    )
    GROUP BY AG.CLUSTER_NAME,AG.REGION,AG.DD_CODE, AG.SLAB_1_TARGET,AG.SLAB_2_TARGET,AG.SLAB_3_TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;-- 331  Rows
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,
ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/SLAB_1_TARGET)*100) ACH_PER_1,
ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/SLAB_2_TARGET)*100) ACH_PER_2,
ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/SLAB_3_TARGET)*100) ACH_PER_3
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 331  Rows
,CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT CLUSTER_NAME, 
SUM(SLAB_1_TARGET) CLUSTER_TARGET_1,
SUM(SLAB_2_TARGET) CLUSTER_TARGET_2, 
SUM(SLAB_3_TARGET) CLUSTER_TARGET_3, 
SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE) CENTRAL_RECHARGE,
ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE)/SUM(SLAB_1_TARGET))*100) CLUSTER_ACH_PER_1, --#CALCULATING CLUSTER WISE ACH_PER --#
ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE)/SUM(SLAB_2_TARGET))*100) CLUSTER_ACH_PER_2, --#CALCULATING CLUSTER WISE ACH_PER --#
ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE)/SUM(SLAB_3_TARGET))*100) CLUSTER_ACH_PER_3  --#CALCULATING CLUSTER WISE ACH_PER --#
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
GROUP BY CLUSTER_NAME
)
--SELECT * FROM CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 5  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,SLAB_3_TARGET,SLAB_2_TARGET, SLAB_1_TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER_3,ACH_PER_2,ACH_PER_1,
    CASE
        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_3_TARGET AND CLUSTER_ACH_PER_1 >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0010)) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_3_TARGET THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_2_TARGET AND CLUSTER_ACH_PER_2 >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0010)) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_2_TARGET THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_1_TARGET AND CLUSTER_ACH_PER_3 >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.007)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0010)) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= SLAB_1_TARGET THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.007) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND REGION WISE ACH PER AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE DD
    LEFT JOIN CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE CC ON CC.CLUSTER_NAME = DD.CLUSTER_NAME  
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 331  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 1538508 TK

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_8MAY25;-- 331  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_8MAY25;-- 1538508 TK

--SELECT SYSDATE-3 FROM DUAL;

------------------SETUP-------------

--STEP 12: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 7850 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
-- 7850 9954 63897
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Booster_1st to 8th May25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 9754  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 62834 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7850 and  CYCLEID = 9954;--63897

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63897;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63897;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 63897 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_8MAY25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63897; -- 1538508 TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 9754  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --Publish month -- 9954

 --STEP 12: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
--EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Bundle Booster_1st to 8th May25',9954,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_8MAY25','SUMMARY DETAILS');

 --STEP 13: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
--EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Bundle Booster_1st to 8th May25', 63897,'May_25', 'May_25',290, 1);

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
--# STEP 1: CREATING THE SUPPORTING DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DN_BB_CAM_TAR_15JAN25;--53  Rows  --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#

UPDATE TEMP_FOR_DN_BB_CAM_TAR_15JAN25 SET DD_CODE = TRIM(DD_CODE), TARGET = ROUND(TARGET);  --#UPDATING THE TABLE FOR ROUNDING TARGET--#
COMMIT;

--# STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_14JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_14JAN25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DN_BB_CAM_TAR_15JAN25 TAR 
INNER JOIN AGENT_LIST_DAILY AG ON AG.DIST_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '14-JAN-25';--117982  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_14JAN25;--563756  Rows  --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_14JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_14JAN25 AS   --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED  --#
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.CLUSTER_TYPE,AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_14JAN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '8-JAN-25' AND '14-JAN-25')  --#THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 8-JAN-25  End Date: 14-JAN-25 IN THE SRF --#
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (19,27,28,33,34,38,42,47,48,49,57,58,64,69,77,78,79,81,89,96,97,98,99,104,108,117,118,127,129,147,148,149,157,167,169
,177,197,198,199,207,209,222,224,227,229,247,248,249,279,297,298,299,337,348,397,398,399,447,448,497,498,499,548,549
,597,599,648,649,698,699,798,799,859,897,899,998,1397) --#DENO OR RECHARGE AMOUNT IS SHARED IN EXECL FOR THE CONDITION Deno: ALL Deno (Deno List will share by B2C) IN THE SRF --#
    GROUP BY AG.CLUSTER_TYPE,AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--53  Rows
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--53  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT CLUSTER_TYPE, SUM(TARGET) CENTRAL_TARGET, SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE) CENTRAL_RECHARGE,ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE)/SUM(TARGET))*100) CLUSTER_ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
GROUP BY CLUSTER_TYPE
)
--SELECT * FROM CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--358  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER,CLUSTER_ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110 AND CLUSTER_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.01)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0015)) --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND CLUSTER WISE ACH PER FOR ADDITIONAL BONUS  AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.01)  --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 AND CLUSTER_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.0015))  --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER AND CLUSTER WISE ACH PER FOR ADDITIONAL BONUS  AND COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008)  --#CHECKING SLAB WISE ACH PER COMMISSION CALCULATION--#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE DD
    LEFT JOIN CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE CC ON CC.CLUSTER_TYPE = DD.CLUSTER_TYPE
    
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--53  Rows   --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_14JAN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--523360            523358.276 TK

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_14JAN25;--53  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_14JAN25;--523360 TK

--SELECT SYSDATE-3 FROM DUAL;


----------------------------SETUP QUERY------------------------------------

--STEP 7: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 7374 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
-- 7374 9574 61321
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Booster_Central Cluster_8th to 14th Jan25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 9574  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Jan_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 61321 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7374 and  CYCLEID = 9574;--61321

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61321;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61321;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 61321 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
--# STEP 1: CREATING THE SUPPORTING DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_20JAN25;--362  Rows

UPDATE TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_20JAN25 SET DD_CODE = TRIM(DD_CODE),TARGET = round(TARGET), INCENTIVE = round(INCENTIVE);--#UPDATING THE TABLE FOR ROUNDING TARGET--#
COMMIT;

--# STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_20JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_20JAN25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_20JAN25 TAR 
INNER JOIN AGENT_LIST_DAILY AG ON AG.DIST_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '20-JAN-25';--563642  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_20JAN25;--63631  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_20JAN25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_20JAN25 AS
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE,INCENTIVE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_20JAN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '11-JAN-25' AND '20-JAN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (19,27,28,33,34,38,42,47,48,49,57,58,64,69,77,78,79,81,89,96,97,98,99,104,108,117,118,127,129,147,148,149,157,167,169,177,197,198,199,207,209,222,224,227,229,247,248,249,279
,297,298,299,337,348,397,398,399,447,448,497,498,499,548,549,597,599,648,649,698,699,798,799,859,897,899,998,1397)
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET,INCENTIVE
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--35  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--357  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN INCENTIVE  --#SLAB WISE INCENTIVE AMOUNT IS GIVEN AS PER SRF --#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
--SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--35  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--284993 TK

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_20JAN25;--35  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_20JAN25;--284993 TK

--SELECT SYSDATE-3 FROM DUAL;


----------------------SETUP_ QUERY---------------------------------------
--STEP 7: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 7394 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
-- 7394 9574 61414
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Booster_GAZ_TAN_11th to 20th Jan25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 9574  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Jan_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 61414 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7394 and  CYCLEID = 9574;--61414

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61414;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61414;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 61414 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_20JAN25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61414; -- 284993 TAKA


--STEP 8: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Bundle Booster_GAZ_TAN_11th to 20th Jan25',9574,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_20JAN25','SUMMARY DETAILS');

--STEP 9: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Bundle Booster_GAZ_TAN_11th to 20th Jan25', 61414,'Jan_25', 'Jan_25',290, 1);

COMMIT;

-- STEP 2: AGENT LIST CREATE --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_MAP_31JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_MAP_31JAN25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_31JAN25 TAR 
INNER JOIN AGENT_LIST_DAILY AG ON AG.DIST_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '31-JAN-25';--563642  Rows  -- #	Agent list of 31st Jan’25 will be considered --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_MAP_31JAN25;--35016  Rows

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_MYM_DET1_31JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_MYM_DET1_31JAN25 AS
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE,INCENTIVE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_MAP_31JAN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '20-JAN-25' AND '31-JAN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (28,38,49,58,69,79,89,96,99,108,118,129,149,169,199,209,229,249,279,299,399,499,549,599,649,699,799,859,899,42,48,78,81,98,104,148,198,222,224,248,298,348,398,448,498,548,
648,698,798,998,19,27,33,34,47,57,64,77,97,117,127,147,157,167,177,197,207,227,247,297,337,397,447,497,597,897,1397)
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET,INCENTIVE
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--35  Rows
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--357  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN 0.8 * INCENTIVE  -- #Upon achieving Deno Recharge target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given 0.8% incentives on Recharge amount till 100% Achievement -- #
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--29  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_MYM_DET1_31JAN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--228026 TK

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_MYM_DET1_31JAN25;--29  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_MYM_DET1_31JAN25;--228026 TK

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)

  --STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT

TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_22_31_JAN25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '31-JAN-25';--118169  Rows

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_22_31_JAN25;-- 118169  Rows

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT_22_31JAN25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT_22_31JAN25 AS
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) ACH
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_22_31_JAN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '22-JAN-25' AND '31-JAN-25') -- # Effective Date: 22-Jan-2025   End Date: 31-Jan-2025 -- #
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (199,227,397,448,549)
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT; --57  Rows
--,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
--SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((ACH/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
--FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
--)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--119 Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, ACH,
    CASE 
    WHEN  ACH >= 400000 THEN 30000   -- # Upon achieving Deno Recharge target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given incentives as per below Slab -- #
    WHEN  ACH >= 200000 THEN 20000
    WHEN  ACH >= 100000 THEN 10000
    ELSE 0 END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--53 Rows  --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT_22_31JAN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--1010000 TAKA

    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '22-JAN-25' AND '31-JAN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (199,227,397,448,549)
--    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
-- STEP 1: CREATING COMMISSION TARGET TABLE
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DENO_GTS_TAR_31JAN25 AS
select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Campaign_GAZ_TAN_SYL_23rd to 31st Jan25') and  --#HERE REPORT NAME WILL BE COMMISSOIN REPORT WISE --#
CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'));--49  Rows --#HERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION WILL BE THE BASE MONTH --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_GTS_TAR_31JAN25;--49  Rows --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#

--UPDATE TEMP_FOR_DENO_GTS_TAR_31JAN25 SET DD_CODE = TRIM(DD_CODE),TARGET = round(TARGET), INCENTIVE = round(INCENTIVE);
--COMMIT;

-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_GTS_MAP_31JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_GTS_MAP_31JAN25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_GTS_TAR_31JAN25 TAR 
INNER JOIN AGENT_LIST_DAILY AG ON AG.DIST_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '31-JAN-25';--86632  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_GTS_MAP_31JAN25;--86632  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_GTS_DET1_31JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_GTS_DET1_31JAN25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE,ROUND(TARGET*1.20) MAX_CAP
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_GTS_MAP_31JAN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '23-JAN-25' AND '31-JAN-25') 
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (28,38,49,58,69,79,89,96,99,108,118,129,149,169,199,209,229,
    249,279,299,399,499,549,599,649,699,799,859,899,42,48,78,81,98,104,148,198,222,224,248,298,348,398,448,498,548,
648,698,798,998,19,27,33,34,47,57,64,77,97,117,127,
147,157,167,177,197,207,227,247,297,337,397,447,497,597,897,1397)--# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--35  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--357  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 120 THEN ROUND(MAX_CAP * .008)--# 	Incentive is capped upto 120%.#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE * .008)--# 	Upon achieving Deno Recharge target, Distributor will be given 0.8% incentives on Total Recharge amount #
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--49  Rows  --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_GTS_DET1_31JAN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--311939 TK

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_GTS_DET1_31JAN25;--49  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_GTS_DET1_31JAN25;--311939 TK

------------------SETUP-----------------------
--STEP 7: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING

--REPORT_ID : 7437 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
-- 7437 9574 61576
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Bundle Campaign_GAZ_TAN_SYL_23rd to 31st Jan25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 9574  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Jan_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 61576 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID)
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7437 and  CYCLEID = 9574;--61576

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61576;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61576;
--commit;

--STEP 8:INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 61576 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_GTS_DET1_31JAN25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61576; -- 311939 TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 9674  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month--#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25'; --base month
--STEP 9: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Bundle Campaign_GAZ_TAN_SYL_23rd to 31st Jan25',9674,'TEMP_FOR_DD_GTS_DET1_31JAN25','SUMMARY DETAILS');

--STEP 10: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Bundle Campaign_GAZ_TAN_SYL_23rd to 31st Jan25', 61576,'Jan_25', 'Feb_25',290, 1);

-- STEP 2: AGENT LIST CREATE --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_MAP_09_MAR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_MAP_09_MAR25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_TAR_9_MAR25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '09-MAR-25';--118276  Rows 

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_MAP_09_MAR25;-- 561279  Rows
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;

--  COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_09MAR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_09MAR25 AS
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT CLUSTER_NAME,AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT,RSO_COUNT, CELEBRATION_BUDGET
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_MAP_09_MAR25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-MAR-25' AND '09-MAR-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,548,549)
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET,RSO_COUNT, CELEBRATION_BUDGET,CLUSTER_NAME
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--335  Rows,
,DD_DATE_WISE_ACH AS(
SELECT AG.DD_CODE,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_MAP_09_MAR25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '7-MAR-25' AND '09-MAR-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,548,549)
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET,RSO_COUNT, CELEBRATION_BUDGET,CLUSTER_NAME
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_DATE_WISE_ACH;
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--52  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT ACH.CLUSTER_NAME,ACH.DD_CODE,  ACH.TARGET, ACH.HIT,ACH_PER, ACH.RSO_COUNT, ACH.CELEBRATION_BUDGET,DAT.HIT HIT_7_9,
    CASE 
    WHEN ACH.CLUSTER_NAME IN ('East Cluster','North Cluster','North East Cluster','Central Cluster') THEN
        CASE 
            WHEN  ACH_PER >= 200 THEN ((ACH.TARGET*2)*50)+CELEBRATION_BUDGET+(DAT.HIT*10)  -- # Incentive is capping to 200% achievement. --#
            WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN (ACH.HIT*50)+CELEBRATION_BUDGET+(DAT.HIT*10) -- #  	Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT + 
			  -- Additional Incentives: DD will receive an additional BDT 10 per Deno hit during of 7th to 9th Mar’25 for North East Cluster, Central Cluster, East Cluster, North Cluster which is uncapped
            WHEN  ACH_PER >= 90 THEN ACH.HIT*40 --  Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 40 incentives per HIT
            ELSE 0 END
     WHEN ACH.CLUSTER_NAME IN ('West Cluster') THEN
        CASE 
            WHEN  ACH_PER >= 200 THEN ((TARGET*2)*50)+(DAT.HIT*20)  -- # Incentive is capping to 200% achievement. --#
            WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN (ACH.HIT*50)+(DAT.HIT*20)  -- #  	Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT + 
			  -- DD will receive an additional BDT 20 per Deno hit during of 7th to 9th Mar’25 for West Cluster which is uncapped.
            WHEN  ACH_PER >= 90 THEN ACH.HIT*40 --  Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 40 incentives per HIT
            ELSE 0 END
     ELSE 0 END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE ACH
    LEFT JOIN DD_DATE_WISE_ACH DAT ON DAT.DD_CODE = ACH.DD_CODE
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--354  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_09MAR25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--529020        308025   TAKA

--# OVERLOOKING THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE DATA --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_09MAR25;--73  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_09MAR25;--6225490 TK

-------------DETAIL------------

-- STEP 4: CREATING THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE DATA --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_BOS_DET2_9MAR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_BOS_DET2_9MAR25 AS
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,RETAILER_CODE,RET_MSISDN,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT--AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_MAP_09_MAR25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-MAR-25' AND '09-MAR-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,548,549)
--    AND REGION IN ('Sylhet')
--    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) 
--    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)

)
SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--109117  Rows

--# OVERLOOKING THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE DATA --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_BOS_DET2_9MAR25;--14686  Rows  54522146

------------------------SETUP----------------------

--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
 --REPORT_ID : 7985 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
-- 7650 9754 62754
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno Booster Campaign_1st to 9th Mar25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7650 and  CYCLEID = 9754;--62754

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62754;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62754;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 62754 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_09MAR25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62754; --    6225490             529020 TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --Publish month --9754
 
  --STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
 EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Deno Booster Campaign_1st to 9th Mar25',9754,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_09MAR25','SUMMERY_DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_DD_BOS_DET2_9MAR25','MSISDN DETAIL');
 
  --STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Deno Booster Campaign_1st to 9th Mar25', 62754,'Mar_25', 'Mar_25',290, 1);

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
-- STEP 1: CREATING COMMISSION TARGET TABLE
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
create table TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_12_FEB25 as
select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno Campaign_12th Feb25') and  --#HERE REPORT NAME WILL BE COMMISSOIN REPORT WISE --#
CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25'));--355  Rows --#HERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION WILL BE THE BASE MONTH --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_12_FEB25;--355  Rows --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#

-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_12_FEB25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_12_FEB25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_12_FEB25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '12-FEB-25';--117449  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_12_FEB25;-- 563873  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET_12_FEB25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET_12_FEB25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_12_FEB25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '12-FEB-25' AND '12-FEB-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497,597,698,699,798,799,998) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 497, 629, 648, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) --# Ryze Recharge (Service Class 141) will not be considered for performance calculation --#
    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)--#Any recharge of campaign deno at BL employee pool phone number will not be considered for DH & Retail achievement. Employee mapping 1st Jan’24 will be consider. --#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--334  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--354  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 111 THEN HIT*25 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 101 THEN HIT*20 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 91 THEN HIT*15 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 70 THEN HIT*10 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--354  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_MAY25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--308025    408575 TAKA

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET_12_FEB25;--354  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET_12_FEB25;--308025            408575 TK

-------------DETAIL------------
--STEP 7: CREATING 2ND DETAIL TABLE
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET2_12_FEB25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET2_12_FEB25 AS
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,RETAILER_CODE,RET_MSISDN,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT--AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_12_FEB25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '12-FEB-25' AND '12-FEB-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497,597,698,699,798,799,998) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 497, 629, 648, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) --# Ryze Recharge (Service Class 141) will not be considered for performance calculation --#
    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)--#Any recharge of campaign deno at BL employee pool phone number will not be considered for DH & Retail achievement. Employee mapping 1st Jan’24 will be consider. --#
)
SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--15446  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET2_12_FEB25) --#

select * from TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET2_12_FEB25;--15446  Rows

----------------SETUP-----------
--STEP 8: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 7522 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
-- 7522 9674 62034
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno Campaign_12th Feb25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 9674  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (May_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 62034 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7522 and  CYCLEID = 9674;--62034

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62034;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62034;
--commit;

--STEP 9: INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 62034 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET_12_FEB25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62034; -- 308025 TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 9674  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Feb_25 if today = 28-Feb-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25'; --Publish month --9674

--STEP 10: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Deno Campaign_12th Feb25',9674,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET_12_FEB25','SUMMERY_DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET2_12_FEB25','MSISDN_DETAIL');
 --STEP 11: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Deno Campaign_12th Feb25', 62034,'Feb_25', 'Feb_25',290, 1);

WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS

CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25'));--355  Rows # WE PROVIDE COMMISSION NAME AND BASE MONTH HERE, AND THEN WE FIND THE TARGET FILE DATA --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_15_FEB25;--355  Rows # THIS TABLE TARGET TABLE, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER, THIS TABLE DATA COMES FROM ABOVE LOGIC WHERE WE PROVIDE COMMISSION NAME AND BASE MONTH HERE --#

CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_15_FEB25 AS --# HERE WE CREATE THE AGENT LIST --#
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_15_FEB25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '15-FEB-25';--117449  Rows --#  Here is	Agent list of 1st Jul’25 will be considered. --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_15_FEB25;-- 563873  Rows # THIS TABLE CONTAINS AGENT LIST --#
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY; --# THIS TABLE IS USED FOR EV RECHARGE DATA --#

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_15_FEB25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_15_FEB25 AS
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_15_FEB25 AG  -- # AGENT LIST --#
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '15-FEB-25' AND '15-FEB-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497,597,698,699,798,799,998) -- #  Effective Date: 1-Jul-2025   End Date: 1-Jul-2025  AND	Deno: 497,597,698,699,798,799,998 --#
    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) --# Ryze Recharge (Service Class 141) will not be considered for performance calculation --#
    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)--#  	Any recharge of campaign deno at BL employee pool phone number will not be considered for DH & Retail achievement. Employee mapping 31st May’25 will be consider. --#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--334  Rows
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--354  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 111 THEN HIT*25 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 101 THEN HIT*20 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 91 THEN HIT*15 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 70 THEN HIT*10 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--354  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--308025    408575 TAKA

    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_15_FEB25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '15-FEB-25' AND '15-FEB-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497,597,698,699,798,799,998)
    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) 
    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)
)
