--# STEP 1: CREATE SUPPORTING DATA TABLE
--TARGET
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_1JAN25 AS
select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno Campaign_1st Jan25') and  
CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'));--1278  Rows # WE PROVIDE COMMISSION NAME AND BASE MONTH HERE, AND THEN WE FIND THE TARGET FILE DATA --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_1JAN25;--370  Rows # THIS TABLE TARGET TABLE, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER, THIS TABLE DATA COMES FROM ABOVE LOGIC WHERE WE PROVIDE COMMISSION NAME AND BASE MONTH HERE --#

-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_1JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_1JAN25 AS --# HERE WE CREATE THE AGENT LIST --#
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_1JAN25 TAR 
INNER JOIN AGENT_LIST_DAILY AG ON AG.DIST_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '1-JAN-25';--134230  Rows --#  Here is	Agent list of 1st JAN’25 will be considered. --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_1JAN25;--560646  Rows # THIS TABLE CONTAINS AGENT LIST --#

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_1JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_1JAN25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_1JAN25 AG -- # AGENT LIST --#
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-JAN-25' AND '1-JAN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497,597,648,699,798,799,998) -- #  Effective Date: 1-JAN-25   End Date: 1-JAN-25  AND	Deno: 497,597,648,699,798,799,998 --#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--355  Rows
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER --#HERE THE CALCULATION OF ACHIVEMENT PERCENT#
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--355  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 111 THEN HIT*30 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 101 THEN HIT*25 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 91 THEN HIT*20 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 81 THEN HIT*15 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 70 THEN HIT*10 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--365  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_1JAN25) --#

    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_1_JUL25 AG -- # AGENT LIST --#
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-JUL-25' AND '1-JUL-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497, 629, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998) -- #  Effective Date: 1-Jul-2025   End Date: 1-Jul-2025  AND	Deno: 497, 629, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998 --#
    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141)  --# Ryze Recharge (Service Class 141) will not be considered for performance calculation --#
    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM TEMP_FOR_VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='31-MAY-25' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)   --#  	Any recharge of campaign deno at BL employee pool phone number will not be considered for DH & Retail achievement. Employee mapping 31st May’25 will be consider. --#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET 
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--322  Rows
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--354  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 121 THEN HIT*25 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 101 THEN HIT*15  -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 91 THEN HIT*10  -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--68  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1JUL25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--218265 TAKA  

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1JUL25;--315  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1JUL25;--234065        119175    TK

-------------DETAIL------------

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_1JUL25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_1JUL25 AS -- # CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_1JUL25) --#
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,RETAILER_CODE,RET_MSISDN,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT--AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_1_JUL25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-JUL-25' AND '1-JUL-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497, 629, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998)
    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) 
    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM TEMP_FOR_VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='31-MAY-25' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)
)
SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--14105  Rows

select * from TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_1JUL25;--12286  Rows  97,08,419  9708419

----------------------SETUP--------------------

FROM REPORT_APPROVAL APP 
INNER JOIN CHANNELTYPE CT ON CT.CHANNELTYPEID = APP.CHANNEL_TYPE_ID

  --STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM

EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Deno Campaign_1st July25',10174,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1JUL25','SUMMERY_DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_1JUL25','MSISDN_DETAIL');

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
-- STEP 1: CREATING COMMISSION TARGET TABLE
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_1MAY25 AS
select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno Campaign_1st May25') and   --#HERE REPORT NAME WILL BE COMMISSOIN REPORT WISE --#
CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'));--339  Rows  --#HERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION WILL BE THE BASE MONTH --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_1MAY25;--340  Rows --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#

-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_1_MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_1_MAY25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_1MAY25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '1-MAY-25';--561446  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_1_MAY25;-- 552507  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_MAY25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_1_MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-MAY-25' AND '1-MAY-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497, 629, 648, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 497, 629, 648, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) --# Ryze Recharge (Service Class 141) will not be considered for performance calculation --#
    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN) --#Any recharge of campaign deno at BL employee pool phone number will not be considered for DH & Retail achievement. Employee mapping 1st Jan’24 will be consider. --#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--335  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--354  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 111 THEN HIT*30 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 101 THEN HIT*25 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 91 THEN HIT*20 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 81 THEN HIT*15 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 70 THEN HIT*10 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--322  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_MAY25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--337595 TAKA

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_MAY25;--311  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_MAY25;--276220           337595      360780  TK

-------------DETAIL------------
--STEP 7: CREATING 2ND DETAIL TABLE
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_1_MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_1_MAY25 AS
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,RETAILER_CODE,RET_MSISDN,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT--AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_1_MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-MAY-25' AND '1-MAY-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497, 629, 648, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 497, 629, 648, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) --# Ryze Recharge (Service Class 141) will not be considered for performance calculation --#
    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)--#Any recharge of campaign deno at BL employee pool phone number will not be considered for DH & Retail achievement. Employee mapping 1st Jan’24 will be consider. --#
)
SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--14105  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_1_MAY25) --#

select * from TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_1_MAY25;--14105  Rows

--------------------SETUP-------------
--STEP 8: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 7834 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
-- 7834 9954 63697
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno Campaign_1st May25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 9954  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (May_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 63697 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7834 and  CYCLEID = 9954;--63697

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63697;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63697;
--commit;

--STEP 9: INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 63697 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_MAY25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63697; --276220   TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 9954  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. May_25 if today = 31-May-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --Publish month --9954

--STEP 10: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Deno Campaign_1st May25',9954,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_MAY25','SUMMERY_DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_1_MAY25','MSISDN_DETAIL');
--STEP 11: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Deno Campaign_1st May25', 63697,'May_25', 'May_25',290, 1);

FROM DD_10TH_MAR25_62812 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '10-MAR-25';--236872  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_10_MAR25;-- 3000  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_2DD_DENO_DAT_10_MAR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_2DD_DENO_DAT_10_MAR25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE,INCENTIVE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_10_MAR25 AG 
    INNER JOIN ev_recharge_com_daily EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '10-MAR-25' AND '10-MAR-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (
    19,27,34,36,47,48,56,57,58,64,69,77,81,86,96,97,99,104,
117,118,127,129,137,147,149,157,167,169,177,188,196,197,
198,199,207,209,222,224,227,229,247,248,259,296,297,298,
299,307,347,348,396,397,398,399,448,497,498,499,548,
549,597,599,649,698,699,719,797,798,799,897,899,997,
998,1199,1397,1899,1999
    ) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR selected deno GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET,INCENTIVE
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT; --67  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE,
    CASE WHEN  TOTAL_RECHARGE >= TARGET THEN INCENTIVE ELSE 0 END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--2 Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_2DD_DENO_DAT_10_MAR25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--12000

-- STEP 1: CREATING COMMISSION TARGET TABLE
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_2MAY25 AS
select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno Campaign_2nd May25') and   --#HERE REPORT NAME WILL BE COMMISSOIN REPORT WISE --#
CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'));--109  Rows  --#HERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION WILL BE THE BASE MONTH --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_2MAY25;--109  Rows --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#


-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_02_MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_02_MAY25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_2MAY25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '02-MAY-25';--561446  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_02_MAY25;--134339  Rows --553098  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_2_MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_2_MAY25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_02_MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '02-MAY-25' AND '02-MAY-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497, 629, 648, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 497, 629, 648, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) 
    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--103  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--103  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN HIT*30 -- #  	Upon achieving Deno HIT target, Distributor will be given BDT 30 PER HIT incentives  --#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--322  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET_31_MAY25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--    213060 TAKA

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_2_MAY25;--96  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_2_MAY25;--161250       TK

-------------DETAIL------------
--STEP 7: CREATING 2ND DETAIL TABLE
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_2_MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_2_MAY25 AS
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,RETAILER_CODE,RET_MSISDN,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT--AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_02_MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '02-MAY-25' AND '02-MAY-25') --# TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497, 629, 648, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 497, 629, 648, 748, 729, 848, 849, 998 GIVEN CONDITION #
    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) --# Ryze Recharge (Service Class 141) will not be considered for performance calculation --#
    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN) --#  	Any recharge of campaign deno at BL employee pool phone number will not be considered for DH & Retail achievement. Employee mapping 31st May’25 will be consider. --#
)
SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--5712  Rows

select * from TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_2_MAY25;--5712  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET2_31MAY25) --#

SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63714;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --

FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_2_MAY25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63714; --161250   TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 64514  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)

SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --Publish month --9954

--STEP 9: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Deno Campaign_2nd May25',9954,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_2_MAY25','SUMMERY_DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_2_MAY25','MSISDN_DETAIL');

--STEP 10: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT

EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Deno Campaign_2nd May25', 63714,'May_25', 'May_25',290, 1);

WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE, COUNT(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT) AS ACH, AG.TARGET,AG.REGION
    FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_EV_DN_DET_14_15JAN25 RECHARGE -- # WE HAVE USED THE CREATED TABLE THAT CONTAINS EV RECHARGE DATA HERE --#
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_DNO_15_JAN25 AG  -- # WE HAVE USED THE AGENT LIST TABLE HERE  --#
        ON AG.RET_MOBILE = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN 
    WHERE RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '14-JAN-25' AND '15-JAN-25' --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 14-JAN-25  End Date: 15-JAN-25      --#
        AND RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (227,337) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 227_337 --# 	
    GROUP BY DD_CODE, AG.TARGET, AG.REGION  
)
--select * from DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT; -- 244  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
    SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*, ROUND((ACH / TARGET) * 100) AS ACH_PER
    FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--select * from DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE; -- 244  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING REGION WISE ACHIVEMENT RANKING
,DD_RANKED AS (
    SELECT REGION, DD_CODE, TARGET, ACH, ACH_PER, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY REGION ORDER BY ACH_PER DESC) AS RN
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE
)
--select * from DD_RANKED; -- 244  Rows
-- STEP 6: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE, TARGET, ACH, ACH_PER,
        CASE
            WHEN RN = 1 AND ACH_PER >= 105 THEN (ACH * 20) + 3000--#Regional Top performing Distributor, based on hit target vs ach, will receive BDT 3,000 Celebration budget for Endless Victory Campaign#
            WHEN ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ACH * 20 --# 	Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 20 incentives per HIT #
            ELSE 0
        END AS COMMISSION
    FROM DD_RANKED
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 244  Rows  --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DN_DET_15_JAN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 120240

SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DN_DET_15_JAN25;-- 120240 TK  --#  THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR DISTRIBUTOR DENO, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DN_DET_15_JAN25; -- 244  Rows  --#  THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR DISTRIBUTOR DENO, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#

---------------------MSISDN DETAIL---------------------------

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DN_DET2_15_JAN25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DN_DET2_15_JAN25 AS # CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DN_DET2_15_JAN25) --#
 SELECT DD_CODE,AG.RET_CODE, RET_MOBILE,RECHARGE.SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_EV_DN_DET_14_15JAN25 RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_DNO_15_JAN25 AG 
    ON AG.RET_MOBILE=RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE (RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '14-JAN-25' AND '15-JAN-25') --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 14-JAN-25  End Date: 15-JAN-25      --#
    AND RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (227,337); -- 11532  Rows --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 227_337 --# 	
    
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DN_DET2_15_JAN25;-- 11532  Rows

--commit;

SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 61332 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DN_DET_15_JAN25
);

SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61332; -- 120240 TAKA

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA
--# THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER --#
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_14AUG24 purge;
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_14AUG24;--375  Rows
update TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_14AUG24 set DD_CODE = trim(DD_CODE);
commit;

-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_14AUG24 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_14AUG24 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN FROM 
TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_14AUG24 TAR 
INNER JOIN AGENT_LIST_DAILY AG ON AG.DIST_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '14-AUG-24';--563663  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_14AUG24;-- 563663  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_14AUG24 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_14AUG24 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT CLUSTER_NAME,REGION,AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_14AUG24 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '13-AUG-24' AND '14-AUG-24') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,497,648,699,798,799,899,998) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 397,497,648,699,798,799,899,998 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET,REGION,CLUSTER_NAME
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--375  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--375  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING REGION ACHIVEMENT
,REGION_WISE_ACH AS (
SELECT REGION,  SUM(TARGET) REGION_TARGET, SUM(HIT) REGION_HIT
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
GROUP BY REGION
)
--SELECT * FROM REGION_WISE_ACH;--23  Rows
-- STEP 6: CALCULATING REGION WISE ACHIVEMENT PARCENTAGE
,REGION_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT CLUSTER_NAME,AL.REGION, DD_CODE, TARGET, HIT, ACH_PER ,REGION_ACH_PER
FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AL 
INNER JOIN (
SELECT REGION,ROUND((REGION_HIT/REGION_TARGET)*100) REGION_ACH_PER
FROM REGION_WISE_ACH PER
) RE ON RE.REGION = AL.REGION
)
--SELECT * FROM REGION_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--375  Rows
-- STEP 7: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT CLUSTER_NAME,REGION,DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,REGION_ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110 AND REGION_ACH_PER >=90 THEN HIT*40
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110 AND (CLUSTER_NAME = 'West Cluster' OR REGION = 'Dhk-West') THEN HIT*40 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ONLY FOR Dhk-West REGION ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 101 AND (CLUSTER_NAME = 'West Cluster' OR REGION = 'Dhk-West') THEN HIT*35 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ONLY FOR Dhk-West REGION ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110  THEN HIT*30 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 101 THEN HIT*25 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 91 THEN HIT*20 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 81 THEN HIT*15 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 70 THEN HIT*10 -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM REGION_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--375  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_14AUG24) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--1787900 TAKA

-- STEP 8: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_14AUG24;--372  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_14AUG24;--1849300             1491950 TK

SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Aug_24'; --base month

SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 6728 and  CYCLEID = 9114;--55755

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 55755;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 55755;
--commit;

--STEP 9: INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 55755 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_14AUG24
);
COMMIT;
--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 55755; -- 1849300 TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 9954  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. May_25 if today = 31-May-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --Publish month --9954
--STEP 10: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Deno Campaign_BDT 397_497_648_699_798_799_899_998_13th to 14th Aug24',9114,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_14AUG24','SUMMARY DETAILS');

--STEP 11: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Deno Campaign_BDT 397_497_648_699_798_799_899_998_13th to 14th Aug24', 55755,'Aug_24', 'Aug_24',290, 1);

WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_20AUG24 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '20-AUG-24' AND '20-AUG-24') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497,498,648,699,799,899,998) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 497,498,648,699,799,899,998 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--138  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)

    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN HIT*30 --#Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 30 per Dono Hit incentives #
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
-- STEP 1: CREATING COMMISSION TARGET TABLE
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DN_BB_CAM_TAR_17FEB25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DN_BB_CAM_TAR_17FEB25 AS
select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno Campaign_Central Cluster_10th to 17th Feb25') and  --#HERE REPORT NAME WILL BE COMMISSOIN REPORT WISE --#
CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25'));--1278  Rows --#HERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION WILL BE THE BASE MONTH --#

SELECT DISTINCT REGION FROM TEMP_FOR_DN_BB_CAM_TAR_17FEB25;--53  Rows --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#

UPDATE TEMP_FOR_DN_BB_CAM_TAR_17FEB25 SET DD_CODE = TRIM(DD_CODE), TARGET = ROUND(TARGET);
COMMIT;

-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_17FEB25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_17FEB25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DN_BB_CAM_TAR_17FEB25 TAR 
INNER JOIN AGENT_LIST_DAILY AG ON AG.DIST_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '17-FEB-25';--117982  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --# 

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_17FEB25;--118169  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_17FEB25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_17FEB25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.CLUSTER_TYPE,AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_17FEB25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '10-FEB-25' AND '16-FEB-25') --#Campaign Date: 10th to 16th Feb’25#
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (
    19,27,34,47,48,57,58,64,69,77,81,96,97,99,104,117,118,127,
    129,147,148,149,157,167,169,177,197,198,199,207,209,222,
    224,227,229,247,248,249,297,298,299,319,337,348,397,398,
    399,448,497,498,499,548,549,597,599,649,698,699,798,799,897,899,998,1397)--#deno list given by b2c#
    AND REGION IN ('Narayanganj','Dhk-East','Dhk-South','Dhk-West') --# For the REGION of Dhk-East, Dhk-South, Dhk-West and Narayanganj #
    GROUP BY AG.CLUSTER_TYPE,AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT AG.CLUSTER_TYPE,AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AGLIST_MAP_17FEB25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '10-FEB-25' AND '17-FEB-25') --#Campaign Date: 10th to 17th Feb’25#
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (19,27,34,47,48,57,58,64,69,77,81,96,97,99,
    104,117,118,127,129,147,148,149,157,167,169,177,197,198,199,207,209,
    222,224,227,229,247,248,249,297,298,299,319,337,348,397,398,399,448,
    497,498,499,548,549,597,599,649,698,699,798,799,897,899,998,1397) --#deno list given by b2c#
    AND REGION IN ('Dhk-North') --# For the REGION of Dhk-North #
    GROUP BY AG.CLUSTER_TYPE,AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--53  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--53  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING CLUSTER ACHIVEMENT
,CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT CLUSTER_TYPE, SUM(TARGET) CENTRAL_TARGET, SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE) CENTRAL_RECHARGE,ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE)/SUM(TARGET))*100) CLUSTER_ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
GROUP BY CLUSTER_TYPE
)
--SELECT * FROM CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--358  Rows
-- STEP 6: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE,ACH_PER,CLUSTER_ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110 AND CLUSTER_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.001)) 
        --#If the Central Cluster hits 100% target, DDs achieving ?100% will get an extra 0.10% on total recharge. and If a DD achieves ?100%, they get 0.8%?+?0.10%. For ?110% achievers, it becomes 0.9%?+?0.10%.#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 110 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.009)
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 AND CLUSTER_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008)+(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.001))
        --#If the Central Cluster hits 100% target, DDs achieving ?100% will get an extra 0.10% on total recharge. and If a DD achieves ?100%, they get 0.8%?+?0.10%. For ?110% achievers, it becomes 0.9%?+?0.10%.#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ROUND(TOTAL_RECHARGE*.008)
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE DD
    LEFT JOIN CENTRAL_WISE_PERCENTAGE CC ON CC.CLUSTER_TYPE = DD.CLUSTER_TYPE
    
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--53  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET_31_MAY25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--353146           353146 TK

-- STEP 7: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_17FEB25;--52  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_17FEB25;--721337 TK

--------------------SETUP-----------------
--STEP 8: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING

--REPORT_ID : 7554 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
-- 7554 9674 62175
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno Campaign_Central Cluster_10th to 17th Feb25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 9674  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Feb_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 62175 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7554 and  CYCLEID = 9674;--62175

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62175;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62175;
--commit;

--STEP 9: INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 62175 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_17FEB25
);
COMMIT;
--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 62175; -- 721337 TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 9674  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month--#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25'; --Publish month 9674

--STEP 10: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Deno Campaign_Central Cluster_10th to 17th Feb25',9674,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET1_17FEB25','SUMMARY DETAILS');

 --STEP 11: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Deno Campaign_Central Cluster_10th to 17th Feb25', 62175,'Feb_25', 'Feb_25',290, 1);

-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_13NOV24 purge;
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_13NOV24;--55  Rows --# THIS TABLE TARGET TABLE, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER --#
update TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_13NOV24 set DD_CODE = trim(DD_CODE);
commit;

-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_13NOV24 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_13NOV24 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_13NOV24 TAR 
INNER JOIN AGENT_LIST_DAILY AG ON AG.DIST_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '13-NOV-24';--118487  Rows--#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_13NOV24;--118487  Rows -- # THIS TABLE CONTAINS AGENT LIST --#

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_10NOV24 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_10NOV24 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( --#achieving Deno HIT target #
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT,C2S_TARGET
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_13NOV24 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '13-NOV-24' AND '13-NOV-24') 
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (497, 597, 648, 699, 798, 799, 998) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 497, 597, 648, 699, 798, 799, 998 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET,C2S_TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--55  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING C2S ACHIVEMENT(TOTAL RECHARGE ACHIVEMENT)
,DD_WISE_C2S_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE,C2S_TARGET
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_13NOV24 AG 
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_EV_RECHARGE_13NOV24 EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '13-NOV-24' AND '13-NOV-24') 
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET,C2S_TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_C2S_ACHIEVEMENT;--55  Rows
-- STEP 5: MARGE DENO HIT TARGET AND RECHARGE TARGET
,DD_WISE_TOTAL_ACH AS (
SELECT HIT.*,TOTAL_RECHARGE
FROM DD_WISE_C2S_ACHIEVEMENT C2S 
LEFT JOIN DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT HIT ON HIT.DD_CODE = C2S.DD_CODE
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_TOTAL_ACH;--55  Rows
-- STEP 6: CALCULATING DENO HIT AND RECHARGE TARGET ACHIVEMENT PARCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/C2S_TARGET)*100) C2S_ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_TOTAL_ACH ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--367  Rows
-- STEP 7: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 AND C2S_ACH_PER >= 100 THEN (HIT*30)
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE

-- STEP 1: CREATING COMMISSION TARGET TABLE
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_TAR_1_9FEB25 AS
select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno Campaign_Central Cluster_1st to 9th Feb25') --#HERE REPORT NAME WILL BE COMMISSOIN REPORT WISE --#
and CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Feb_25')); --#HERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION WILL BE THE BASE MONTH --#


------------------AGENT LIST--------------------
-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_1_9_FEB25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_1_9_FEB25 AS
SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ DISTINCT
    TAR.DD_CODE,
    MAPING.RET_CODE,
    MAPING.RET_MOBILE,
    TAR.TARGET
FROM DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY MAPING
INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DD_TAR_1_9FEB25 TAR ON MAPING.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE
WHERE DATA_DATE='9-FEB-25'; --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_1_9_FEB25;-- 118197  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#
--1915273989  87                          
-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_1_9FEB25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_1_9FEB25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED #
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,SUM(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT) ACH,AG.TARGET
    FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_1_9_FEB25 AG 
        ON AG.RET_MOBILE = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '1-FEB-25' AND '9-FEB-25'
        AND RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN 
        (
        58,69,96,99,118,129,149,169,199,209,229,249,299,399,499,549,599,649,699,
799,899,48,81,104,148,198,222,224,248,298,348,398,448,498,548,698,798,998,
19,27,34,47,57,64,77,97,117,127,147,157,167,177,
197,207,227,247,297,337,397,497,597,897,1397
        ) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT; -- 52  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((ACH/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 52  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT 
        DD_CODE,
        TARGET,
        ACH,
        ACH_PER,
        ROUND(
            CASE
                WHEN ACH_PER >= 110 THEN (0.01 * ACH) + (0.0015 * ACH) -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE AND Additional Incentives  ARE GIVEN HERE --#
                WHEN ACH_PER >= 100 THEN (0.008 * ACH) + (0.0015 * ACH) -- # SLAB WISE INCENTIVE AND Additional Incentives ARE GIVEN HERE --#
                ELSE 0
            END 
        ) AS COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--  52  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET_1_MAY25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 1067453

SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_1_9FEB25;--1067453 TK

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_1_9FEB25; -- 52  Rows

---------------------MSISDN DETAIL---------------------------
--STEP 7: CREATING 2ND DETAIL TABLE
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_1_9FEB25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_1_9FEB25 AS --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_1_9FEB25) --#
 SELECT DD_CODE,AG.RET_CODE, RET_MOBILE,RECHARGE.SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_EV_DET_1_9FEB25 RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_1_9_FEB25 AG 
    ON AG.RET_MOBILE=RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE (RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-FEB-25' AND '9-FEB-25') 
    AND RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (58,69,96,99,118,129,149,169,199,209,229,249,299,399,499,549,599,649,699,
799,899,48,81,104,148,198,222,224,248,298,348,398,448,498,548,698,798,998,
19,27,34,47,57,64,77,97,117,127,147,157,167,177,
197,207,227,247,297,337,397,497,597,897,1397);-- 562334  Rows --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_1_9FEB25;-- 562334  Rows

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA
--# THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER --#
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_TAR_15_21JAN25 purge;
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_TAR_15_21JAN25;-- 74  Rows
SELECT DD_CODE, COUNT(DD_CODE) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_TAR_15_21JAN25 GROUP BY DD_CODE HAVING COUNT(DD_CODE)>1;-- 68  Rows #VERIFY THE DUPLICATE DATA#
--SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_TAR_15_21JAN25 t where t.PARTICIPATION_TARGET <=0;--0 ROW
update TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_TAR_15_21JAN25 set DD_CODE = trim(DD_CODE);
commit;

------------------AGENT LIST--------------------
-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
-- drop table TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_15_21JAN25 purge;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_15_21JAN25 AS
SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ DISTINCT
    TAR.DD_CODE,
    MAPING.RET_CODE,
    MAPING.RET_MOBILE,
    TAR.TARGET
FROM DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY MAPING
INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_TAR_15_21JAN25 TAR ON MAPING.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE
WHERE DATA_DATE='21-JAN-25'; -- 148491  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_15_21JAN25;-- 130150  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#
--1915273989  87                          
-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_15_21JAN25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_15_21JAN25 AS
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,RET_MOBILE,AG.TARGET,TOP_UP_DATE,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT) >=6 THEN 6 ELSE COUNT(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT) END AS ACH --# HERE THE LOGIC FOR More than 6 Hits by any retailers in a single day will be discarded from achievement#
    FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_15_21JAN25 AG 
        ON AG.RET_MOBILE = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '15-JAN-25' AND '21-JAN-25' 
        AND RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (398,399,448) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 398,399,448 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,RET_MOBILE,TOP_UP_DATE
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT; -- 25173  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT
,DD_WISE_ACH AS (
SELECT DD_CODE, TARGET,SUM(ACH) ACH
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT
GROUP BY DD_CODE, TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACH;
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,RSO_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((ACH/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACH ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 68  Rows
-- STEP 6: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,TARGET,ACH,ACH_PER, 
    CASE
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 150  THEN ((TARGET * 1.5) * 60) --#Incentives capped upto 150% achievement.#
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 100 THEN (ACH * 60) --# Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 60 incentives per HIT#
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 90 THEN ACH * 50--# Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RSO_WISE_PERCENTAGE
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 111  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_15_21JAN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 802080 TAKA

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_15_21JAN25; --73  Rows

---------------------MSISDN DETAIL---------------------------
--STEP 7: CREATING 2ND DETAIL TABLE
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_15_21JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_15_21JAN25 AS --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_15_21JAN25) --#
 SELECT DD_CODE,AG.RET_CODE, RET_MOBILE,RECHARGE.SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_EV_DET_15_21_JAN25 RECHARGE

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA
--# THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER --#
select * from TEMP_FOR_DENO_POR_TAR_8AUG24;
SELECT DISTINCT CATEGORY, INCENTIVE  FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_POR_TAR_8AUG24;--375  Rows
update TEMP_FOR_DENO_POR_TAR_8AUG24 set DD_CODE = trim(DD_CODE),RECHARGE_RECHARGE_TARGET = ROUND(RECHARGE_RECHARGE_TARGET);
commit;

-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_1_8AUG24 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_1_8AUG24 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN FROM 
TEMP_FOR_DENO_POR_TAR_8AUG24 TAR 
INNER JOIN AGENT_LIST_DAILY AG ON AG.DIST_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '8-AUG-24';--563192  Rows --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_1_8AUG24;-- 563192  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_1_8AUG24 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_1_8AUG24 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT CLUSTER_NAME,REGION,AG.DD_CODE,CATEGORY,AG.RECHARGE_TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE,INCENTIVE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_1_8AUG24 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-AUG-24' AND '8-AUG-24') 
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (199,229,249,299,399,499,599,699,799,899)--# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 199,229,249,299,399,499,599,699,799,899 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.RECHARGE_TARGET,REGION,CLUSTER_NAME, CATEGORY, INCENTIVE
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--374  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((TOTAL_RECHARGE/RECHARGE_TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--374  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING CLUSTER WISE RANKING
,CLUSTER_WISE_RNK AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY CLUSTER_NAME ORDER BY TOTAL_RECHARGE DESC) AS RANK
FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM CLUSTER_WISE_RNK; 
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT CLUSTER_NAME, REGION, DD_CODE, CATEGORY, RECHARGE_TARGET, TOTAL_RECHARGE, INCENTIVE, ACH_PER, RANK,
    CASE
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 AND RANK = 1 THEN 15000--#Cluster top DH will get incentive of tk 15000#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 AND CATEGORY = 'D' THEN 12000--# SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 AND CATEGORY = 'C' THEN 10000--# SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 AND CATEGORY = 'B' THEN 8000--# SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 AND CATEGORY = 'A' THEN 5000--# SLAB WISE INCENTIVE ARE GIVEN HERE --#
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM CLUSTER_WISE_RNK 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--374  Rows--# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_1_8AUG24) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--806000 TAKA

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_1_8AUG24;--372  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DET1_1_8AUG24;--806000             1491950 TK

select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Deno_East Cluster_BDT_397_399_448_548_549_10th to 15th Feb25') and--#HERE REPORT NAME WILL BE COMMISSOIN REPORT WISE --#

SELECT DD_CODE, COUNT(DD_CODE) FROM EAST_10_TO_15TH_FEB25_62157 GROUP BY DD_CODE HAVING COUNT(DD_CODE)>1;-- 0  Rows
--SELECT * FROM EAST_10_TO_15TH_FEB25_62157 t where t.PARTICIPATION_TARGET <=0;--0 ROW

-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
-- drop table TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_NE_15_FEB25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_NE_15_FEB25 AS
SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ DISTINCT
    TAR.REGION,TAR.DD_CODE,MAPING.RET_CODE,MAPING.RET_MOBILE,TAR.TARGET
FROM DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY MAPING
INNER JOIN EAST_10_TO_15TH_FEB25_62157 TAR ON MAPING.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE
WHERE DATA_DATE='15-FEB-25'; --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_NE_15_FEB25;-- 107016  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#
--1915273989  87                          
-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_10_15FEB25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_10_15FEB25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS (
    SELECT REGION,DD_CODE,RET_MOBILE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT) ACH
    FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_NE_15_FEB25 AG 
        ON AG.RET_MOBILE = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '10-FEB-25' AND '15-FEB-25' --# TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
        AND (RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN ( 397,448,548,549 ) AND AG.REGION IN ('Brahmanbaria')) OR --#Deno: 397, 448, 548 & 549  for Brahmanbaria Region#
(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,399,448,548 ) AND AG.REGION IN ('Cumilla', 'Chittagong South' ,'Chittagong North'))--#Deno: 397, 399, 448 & 548 for Cumilla, Chittagong South & Chittagong North#
    GROUP BY REGION,DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,RET_MOBILE
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT; -- 6350  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT
,DD_WISE_ACH AS (
SELECT DD_CODE, TARGET,SUM(ACH) ACH
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT
GROUP BY DD_CODE, TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACH; -- 57  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((ACH/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACH ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 57  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,TARGET,ACH,ACH_PER, 
    CASE
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ACH * 50--#Upon achieving Deno HIT target, Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT #
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 90 THEN ACH * 40--#Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target, Distributor will be given BDT 40 incentives per HIT #
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 57  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_10_15FEB25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 738020 TAKA

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_10_15FEB25; -- 57  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_10_15FEB25;-- 738020 TK

 SELECT DD_CODE,AG.RET_CODE, RET_MOBILE,RECHARGE.SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_EV_DET_NE_10_15FEB25 RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_NE_15_FEB25 AG 
    ON AG.RET_MOBILE=RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE (RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '10-FEB-25' AND '15-FEB-25')
    AND (RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN ( 397,448,548,549 ) AND AG.REGION IN ('Brahmanbaria')) OR 
(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,399,448,548 ) AND AG.REGION IN ('Cumilla', 'Chittagong South' ,'Chittagong North')) ;-- 32613  Rows
    
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_NE_10_15FEB25;-- 15105  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_HIT_DET2_31MAY25) --#

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA
--# THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_TAR_1_8FEB25;-- 135  Rows
SELECT DD_CODE, COUNT(DD_CODE) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_TAR_1_8FEB25 GROUP BY DD_CODE HAVING COUNT(DD_CODE)>1;-- 0  Rows

select * from DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY;
------------------AGENT LIST--------------------
-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
-- drop table TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_NE_8_FEB25 purge;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_NE_8_FEB25 AS
SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ DISTINCT
    TAR.REGION,
    TAR.DD_CODE,
    MAPING.RET_CODE,
    MAPING.RET_MOBILE,
    TAR.TARGET
FROM DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY MAPING
INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_TAR_1_8FEB25 TAR ON MAPING.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE
WHERE DATA_DATE='8-FEB-25';--#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_NE_8_FEB25;-- 228868  Rows --#THIS IS THE CREATED AGENT LIST TABLE--#
--1915273989  87                          
-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------
-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_1_8FEB25 purge;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_1_8FEB25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,RET_MOBILE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT) ACH
    FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_NE_8_FEB25 AG 
        ON AG.RET_MOBILE = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '1-FEB-25' AND '8-FEB-25'--#TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date#
        AND (RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (399,448,548) AND AG.REGION IN ('Sylhet')) OR --#Deno:399, 448 & 548 for Sylhet Region#
(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (498,548,549) AND AG.REGION IN ('Gazipur', 'Tangail', 'Mymensingh')) OR--#Deno:498, 548 & 549 for Gazipur, Tangail & Mymensingh Region#
(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,448,548,549) AND AG.REGION IN ('Brahmanbaria')) OR--#Deno:397, 448, 548 & 549 for Brahmanbaria Region#
(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,399,448,548) AND AG.REGION IN ('Cumilla', 'Chittagong South', 'Chittagong North'))--#Deno:397, 399, 448 & 548 for Cumilla, Chittagong South & Chittagong North#
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,RET_MOBILE
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT; -- 16254  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT
,DD_WISE_ACH AS (
SELECT DD_CODE, TARGET,SUM(ACH) ACH
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT
GROUP BY DD_CODE, TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACH; -- 130  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((ACH/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACH ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 130  Rows
-- STEP 6: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,TARGET,ACH,ACH_PER, 
    CASE
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 100 THEN ACH * 60--#Upon achieving Deno HIT target, Distributor will be given BDT 60 incentives per HIT #
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 90 THEN ACH * 50--#Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target, Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT #
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 130  Rows--# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_1_8FEB25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 1423780 TAKA

-- STEP 7: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_1_8FEB25; -- 130  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_1_8FEB25;-- 1423780 TK
---------------------MSISDN DETAIL---------------------------
--STEP 8: CREATING 2ND DETAIL TABLE
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_NE_1_8FEB25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_NE_1_8FEB25 AS
 SELECT DD_CODE,AG.RET_CODE, RET_MOBILE,RECHARGE.SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_EV_DET_NE_1_8FEB25 RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DDAGENT_NE_8_FEB25 AG 
    ON AG.RET_MOBILE=RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE (RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-FEB-25' AND '8-FEB-25') AND (RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (399,448,548) AND AG.REGION IN ('Sylhet')) OR 
(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (498,548,549) AND AG.REGION IN ('Gazipur', 'Tangail', 'Mymensingh')) OR
(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,448,548,549) AND AG.REGION IN ('Brahmanbaria')) OR
(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,399,448,548) AND AG.REGION IN ('Cumilla', 'Chittagong South', 'Chittagong North'));-- 32613  Rows
    
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_NE_1_8FEB25;-- 32613  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET2_NE_1_8FEB25) --#
    
----------------------SETUP-------------------

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61916;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61916;
--commit;

--STEP 10:INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 61916 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_FCS_DET_NE_1_8FEB25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61916; -- 1423780 TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 9674  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)

--STEP 12: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT

-- STEP 1: CREATING COMMISSION TARGET TABLE
--#HERE TARGET TABLE FOR THE COMMISSION WILL BE CREATED--#
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DENO_SYL_CAMP_TAR_23_31_JAN25 AS
select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Dhamaka Campaign_SYL_23rd to 31st Jan25') and   --#HERE REPORT NAME WILL BE COMMISSOIN REPORT WISE --#
CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'));--109  Rows  --#HERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION WILL BE THE BASE MONTH --#

select * from TEMP_FOR_DENO_SYL_CAMP_TAR_23_31_JAN25; --# THIS IS THE CREATED TARGET TABLE --#
------------------AGENT LIST--------------------
-- STEP 2: CREATING THE AGENT LIST 
-- drop table TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_31_JAN25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_31_JAN25 AS
SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ DISTINCT
    TAR.DD_CODE,
    MAPING.RET_CODE,
    MAPING.RET_MOBILE,
    TAR.TARGET
FROM DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY MAPING
INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_DENO_SYL_CAMP_TAR_23_31_JAN25 TAR ON MAPING.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE
WHERE DATA_DATE='31-JAN-25'; --#HERE DATA DATE WILL BE THE LAST DATE OF THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_31_JAN25;-- 23240  Rows
--1915273989  87                          
-------------------------------HELPER QUERY------------------------------------

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION QUERY START 
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DD_SYL_DET_23_31JAN25 purge;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SYL_DET_23_31JAN25 AS --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IN CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_SUMMARY AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT) ACH,
    ROUND(TARGET * 1.3) AS MAX_CAP, --# Incentives in capped upto 130%.#
    SUM(CASE WHEN RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (348,399) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Ach_348_399,
        SUM(CASE WHEN RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT = 169 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Ach_169
    FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_31_JAN25 AG 
        ON AG.RET_MOBILE = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '23-JAN-25' AND '31-JAN-25'
        AND RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (169,348,399) --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Deno: 169,348,399 GIVEN CONDITION AND TOP_UP_DATE WILL BE Effective Date--#
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_SUMMARY; -- 14  Rows
-- STEP 4: CALCULATING ACHIEVMENT PERCENTAGE
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((ACH/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER,
ROUND((Ach_348_399/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER_348_399,
ROUND((Ach_169/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER_169
FROM DD_WISE_SUMMARY ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 64  Rows
-- STEP 5: CALCULATING COMMISSION AMOUNT
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,TARGET,ACH,ACH_PER,Ach_348_399, Ach_169,ACH_PER_348_399,ACH_PER_169,MAX_CAP,
    CASE
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 100 and MAX_CAP >= Ach_348_399+Ach_169 THEN (Ach_348_399*50)+(Ach_169*20) --#Upon achieving 100% Deno HIT target, Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT for Deno 348_399 and BDT 20 incentives PER HIT for Deno 169 #
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 100 and MAX_CAP <= Ach_348_399 THEN (MAX_CAP*50)--Upon achieving 100% Deno HIT target, Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT for Deno 348_399#
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 100 and MAX_CAP <= Ach_348_399+Ach_169 THEN (Ach_348_399*50)+((MAX_CAP-Ach_348_399)*20) --#Upon achieving 100% Deno HIT target, Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT for Deno 348_399 and BDT 20 incentives PER HIT for Deno 169 #
        WHEN ACH_PER >= 90 THEN (Ach_348_399*40)+(Ach_169*15)--# 	Upon achieving 90%-99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 40 incentives per HIT for Deno 348_399 and BDT 15 incentives PER HIT for Deno 169 #
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 14  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_SYL_DET_23_31JAN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 78000 TAKA

-- STEP 6: CHECKING THE CRATED TABLE DATA
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_SYL_DET_23_31JAN25;--78000 TK
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_SYL_DET_23_31JAN25; --14  Rows

---------------------MSISDN DETAIL---------------------------
--STEP 7: CREATING 2ND DETAIL TABLE
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SYL_DET2_23_31JAN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SYL_DET2_23_31JAN25 AS
 SELECT DD_CODE,AG.RET_CODE, RET_MOBILE,RECHARGE.SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_31_JAN25 AG

-- 7451 9574 61612

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA

--select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
--WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
--where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 397_548_549_1st to 6th Jun25') and  
--CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jun_25'));--341  Rows

SELECT distinct CLUSTER_NAME FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_15JUN25;--227  Rows
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_15JUN25;--227  Rows    --# THIS IS TARGET TABLE AFTER CREATING --#
UPDATE TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_15JUN25 SET TARGET = ROUND(TARGET),DD_CODE = TRIM(DD_CODE);

-- STEP 2: AGENT LIST CREATE --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_6_MAY25 PURGE;
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_15MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_15MAY25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_15JUN25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '15-JUN-25';--561446 

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_15MAY25;--557087  Rows       554713  Rows               552507  Rows
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_6_JUN25 PURGE;
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_15_JUN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_15JUN25 AS  --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_15_JUN25 AS
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME,AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (548,549) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_548_549,  --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_397  --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_15MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '10-JUN-25' AND '15-JUN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,548,549)  --# Effective Date: 1-Jun-2025   End Date: 6-Jun-2025 and  Deno: 397_548_549 --#
    
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;-- msisdn details
,DENO_WISE_COUNT AS (
SELECT  CLUSTER_NAME,DD_CODE, TARGET, COUNT(*) HIT,ROUND(COUNT(*)*100/TARGET) ACH_PER,SUM(DENO_548_549) DENO_548_549_HIT, SUM(DENO_397) DENO_397_HIT
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACH
GROUP BY CLUSTER_NAME,DD_CODE, TARGET
)
--SELECT * from DENO_WISE_COUNT;--335  Rows
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT CC.*,
CASE WHEN  ACH_PER >= 200 THEN 
            CASE WHEN TARGET*2 <= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN TARGET*2 *30  --# Incentive is capping to 200% achievement --#
                 WHEN TARGET*2 >= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT *30)+(((TARGET*2 )-DENO_548_549_HIT)*15)
                 ELSE 0 END
     WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT*30)+(DENO_397_HIT*15) --# Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 30 incentives per HIT for Deno 548 and 549, and BDT 15 per hit for Deno 397 --#
     WHEN  ACH_PER >= 90 THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT*20)+(DENO_397_HIT*10)  --# Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 20 incentives per HIT for Deno 548 and 549, and BDT 10 per hit for Deno 397 --#
     ELSE 0 END AS COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM DENO_WISE_COUNT CC
)
SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--335  Rows  --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_6_JUN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--3433140          5231890 TAKA  RAJBOG23

-- STEP 4: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_15_JUN25;--227  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_15_JUN25;--795790           2202020     TK

--# OVERLOOKING THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE DATA --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_15JUN25;--40847  Rows     Rows MSISDN DETAILS


--------------------SETUP-------------
--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
 --REPORT_ID : 7985 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 397_548_549_10th to 15th Jun25';

SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jun_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 8002 and  CYCLEID = 10074;--64734

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 64734;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 64734;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 64734 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_15_JUN25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 64734; --795790        2202020        3433140            5231890   TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jun_25'; --Publish month --10074
 
  --STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM

EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 397_548_549_10th to 15th Jun25',10074,'TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_15_JUN25','SUMMERY_DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_15JUN25','MSISDN_DETAIL');
 
 --STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT

EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 397_548_549_10th to 15th Jun25', 64734,'Jun_25', 'Jun_25',290, 1);

--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_10_15_MAY25 AS
--select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
--WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
--where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 397_548_549_1st to 8th May25') and  
--CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'));--341  Rows

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_10_15_MAY25;-- 337  Rows

-- STEP 2: AGENT LIST CREATE --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_DET_22_MAY25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_DET_22_MAY25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_10_15_MAY25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '15-MAY-25';-- 555867  Rows

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_DET_22_MAY25;--  555867  Rows    554713  Rows               552507  Rows
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_10_15MAY25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_10_15MAY25 AS
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_10_15MAY25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_10_15MAY25 AS  --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME,AG.D_CODE DD_CODE,AG.HIT_TARGET TARGET, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (548,549) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_548_549, --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_397 --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_DET_22_MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '17-MAY-25' AND '22-MAY-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,548,549) --# Effective Date: 10-May-2025  End Date: 15-May-2025 and  Deno: 397_548_549 --#
--    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) 
--    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)
--    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;-- 72809  Rows
,DENO_WISE_COUNT AS (
SELECT  CLUSTER_NAME,DD_CODE, TARGET, COUNT(*) HIT,ROUND(COUNT(*)*100/TARGET) ACH_PER,SUM(DENO_548_549) DENO_548_549_HIT, SUM(DENO_397) DENO_397_HIT
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACH
GROUP BY CLUSTER_NAME,DD_CODE, TARGET
)
--SELECT * from DENO_WISE_COUNT;  -- 328  Rows
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT CC.*,
CASE WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 200 THEN (TARGET*2)* 60 --# Incentive is capping to 200% achievement For West Cluster --#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 100 THEN HIT* 60 --#  Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 60 incentives per HIT   ( FOR WEST CLUSTER )--#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 90 THEN HIT* 50 --#  	Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 40 incentives per HIT ( FOR WEST CLUSTER )--#
      WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 200 THEN --# Incentive is capping to 200% achievement Except West Cluster --#
            CASE WHEN TARGET*2 <= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN TARGET*2 *50 --# WHEN TARGET*2 <= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN THIS LOGIC   --#
                 WHEN TARGET*2 >= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN DENO_548_549_HIT*50+((TARGET*2 )-DENO_548_549_HIT)*30  --# WHEN TARGET*2 >= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN THIS LOGIC   --#
                 ELSE 0 END
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 100 THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT*60)+(DENO_397_HIT*40) --# Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 60 incentives per HIT for Deno 548 and 549, and BDT 40 per hit for Deno 397  ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 90 THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT*50)+(DENO_397_HIT*30) --# Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT for Deno 548 and 549, and BDT 30 per hit for Deno 397  ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
     ELSE 0 END AS COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM DENO_WISE_COUNT CC
)
