--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------
-- 7451 9574 61612

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA
--# THIS TARGET TABLE WILL BE CREATED BASED ON COMMISSION NAME AND BASE MONTH --#
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_6JUN25 AS
--select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
--WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
--where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 397_548_549_1st to 6th Jun25') and     --# HERE PROVIDE COMMISSION NAME--#
--CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jun_25'));--341  Rows  --# HERE PROVIDE BASE MONTH--#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_6JUN25;--338  Rows    --# THIS IS TARGET TABLE AFTER CREATING --#

-- STEP 2: AGENT LIST CREATE --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_6_MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_6_MAY25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAM_TAR_6JUN25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '5-JUN-25';--561446  Rows  --# Agent list of 5th Jun’25 will be considered --#  	

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_6_MAY25;--557087  Rows  554713  Rows  552507  Rows

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_6_JUN25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_6_JUN25 AS   --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_6_JUN25 AS 
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME,AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (548,549) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_548_549, --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_397 --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_6_MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-JUN-25' AND '5-JUN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,548,549) --# Effective Date: 1-Jun-2025   End Date: 6-Jun-2025 and  Deno: 397_548_549 --#
    AND CLUSTER_NAME NOT IN ('West Cluster') --# FOR WEST CLUSTER --#
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME,AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (548,549) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_548_549, --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_397  --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_6_MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-JUN-25' AND '6-JUN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,548,549) --# Effective Date: 1-Jun-2025   End Date: 6-Jun-2025 and  Deno: 397_548_549 --#
    AND CLUSTER_NAME IN ('West Cluster')  --# EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER --#
)
SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;-- msisdn details --# CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_6_JUN25) --#
,DENO_WISE_COUNT AS (
SELECT  CLUSTER_NAME,DD_CODE, TARGET, COUNT(*) HIT,ROUND(COUNT(*)*100/TARGET) ACH_PER,SUM(DENO_548_549) DENO_548_549_HIT, SUM(DENO_397) DENO_397_HIT
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACH
GROUP BY CLUSTER_NAME,DD_CODE, TARGET
)
--SELECT * from DENO_WISE_COUNT;--335  Rows
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT CC.*,
CASE WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 200 THEN (TARGET*2)* 50  --# Incentive is capping to 200% achievement ( FOR WEST CLUSTER )--#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 100 THEN HIT* 50 --# Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT  ( FOR WEST CLUSTER )--#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 90 THEN HIT* 40  --#  	Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 40 incentives per HIT ( FOR WEST CLUSTER )--#
      WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 200 THEN  --# Incentive is capping to 200% achievement ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
            CASE WHEN TARGET*2 <= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN TARGET*2 *50 --# WHEN TARGET*2 <= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN THIS LOGIC ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )  --#
                 WHEN TARGET*2 >= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT *50)+(((TARGET*2 )-DENO_548_549_HIT)*30)  --# WHEN TARGET*2 >= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN THIS LOGIC ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )  --#
                 ELSE 0 END
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 100 THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT*50)+(DENO_397_HIT*30)  --#  	Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT for Deno 548 and 549, and BDT 30 per hit for Deno 397 ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 90 THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT*40)+(DENO_397_HIT*20)  --# Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 40 incentives per HIT for Deno 548 and 549, and BDT 20 per hit for Deno 397  ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
     ELSE 0 END AS COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM DENO_WISE_COUNT CC
)
SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--335  Rows  --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_6_JUN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--3433140          5231890 TAKA  RAJBOG23

-- STEP 4: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_6_JUN25;--335  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_6_JUN25;--2202020            3433140       5231890           404490   TK

--# OVERLOOKING THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE DATA --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_6_JUN25;--335  Rows  62463  Rows    Rows MSISDN DETAILS

-----------------------SETUP-------------------
--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
 --REPORT_ID : 7985 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 397_548_549_1st to 6th Jun25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jun_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7985 and  CYCLEID = 10074;--64616

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 64616;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 64616;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 64616 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_6_JUN25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 64616; --2202020        3433140            5231890   TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jun_25'; --Publish month --10074
 
 --STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 397_548_549_1st to 6th Jun25',10074,'TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_6_JUN25','SUMMERY_DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_6_JUN25','MSISDN_DETAIL');
 
--STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 397_548_549_1st to 6th Jun25', 64616,'Jun_25', 'Jun_25',290, 1);

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_8_MAY25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_8_MAY25 AS  --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME,AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (548,549) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_548_549, --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_397 --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LST_MAP_8_MAY25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-MAY-25' AND '8-MAY-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,548,549) --# Effective Date: 1-May-2025   End Date: 8-May-2025 and  Deno: 397_548_549 --#
--    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) 
--    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)
--    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;-- 98713  Rows
,DENO_WISE_COUNT AS (
SELECT  CLUSTER_NAME,DD_CODE, TARGET, COUNT(*) HIT,ROUND(COUNT(*)*100/TARGET) ACH_PER,SUM(DENO_548_549) DENO_548_549_HIT, SUM(DENO_397) DENO_397_HIT
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACH
GROUP BY CLUSTER_NAME,DD_CODE, TARGET
)
--SELECT * from DENO_WISE_COUNT; --329  Rows
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT CC.*,
CASE WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 200 THEN (TARGET*2)* 60  --# Incentive is capping to 200% achievement ( FOR WEST CLUSTER )--#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 100 THEN HIT* 60   --#  	Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 60 incentives per HIT  ( FOR WEST CLUSTER )--#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 90 THEN HIT* 50  --#  	 	Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT  ( FOR WEST CLUSTER )--#
      WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 200 THEN   --# Incentive is capping to 200% achievement ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
            CASE WHEN TARGET*2 <= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN TARGET*2 *60   --# WHEN TARGET*2 <= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN THIS LOGIC   --#
                 ELSE 0 END
                 WHEN TARGET*2 >= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN DENO_548_549_HIT*60+((TARGET*2 )-DENO_548_549_HIT)*40  --# WHEN TARGET*2 >= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN THIS LOGIC ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )  --#
                 ELSE 0 END
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 100 THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT*60)+(DENO_397_HIT*40)   --# Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 60 incentives per HIT for Deno 548 and 549, and BDT 40 per hit for Deno 397  ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 90 THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT*50)+(DENO_397_HIT*30) --# Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT for Deno 548 and 549, and BDT 30 per hit for Deno 397   ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
     ELSE 0 END AS COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM DENO_WISE_COUNT CC
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--329  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 5327040 TAKA

-- STEP 4: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_8_MAY25;--329  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_8_MAY25;-- 5327040   TK

INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '30-JUN-25';


-- STEP 3: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_23_30JUN25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_23_30JUN25 AS
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_23_30JUN25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_23_30JUN25 AS  --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED
WITH RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME,AG.DD_CODE,AG.HIT_TGT TARGET, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,TOP_UP_DATE,
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (548,549) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_548_549, --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_397  --# DENO IS TRACKED FOR CLUSTER WISE CALCULATION --#
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_DET_30JUN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '24-JUN-25' AND '30-JUN-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,548,549) --# AS PER SRF DATE: 24th-30th Jun’25  and  Deno: 397_548_549 --#
    AND CLUSTER_NAME IN('Central Cluster','West Cluster')
    
    UNION ALL
    SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ CLUSTER_NAME,AG.DD_CODE,AG.HIT_TGT TARGET, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,TOP_UP_DATE,
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (548,549) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_548_549,
    CASE WHEN RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DENO_397
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_DET_30JUN25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '23-JUN-25' AND '30-JUN-25') 
    AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (397,548,549) --# AS PER SRF  DATE: 23rd-30th Jun’25  and  Deno: 397_548_549 --#
    AND CLUSTER_NAME IN('East Cluster', 'North Cluster','North East Cluster')
)
--SELECT * FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;-- 97118  Rows 72809  Rows TEMP_FOR_DD_DN_DET2_23_30JUN25
,DENO_WISE_COUNT AS (
SELECT  CLUSTER_NAME,DD_CODE, TARGET, COUNT(*) HIT,ROUND(COUNT(*)*100/TARGET) ACH_PER,SUM(DENO_548_549) DENO_548_549_HIT, SUM(DENO_397) DENO_397_HIT
FROM RSO_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACH
GROUP BY CLUSTER_NAME,DD_CODE, TARGET
)
--SELECT * from DENO_WISE_COUNT;  -- 335  Rows 328  Rows
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT CC.*,
CASE WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 200 THEN (TARGET*2)* 50 --# Incentive is capping to 200% achievement ( FOR WEST CLUSTER )--#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 100 THEN HIT* 50 --# Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT for Deno 397, 548 and 549
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME ='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 90 THEN HIT* 40 --# Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 40 incentives per HIT for Deno 397, 548 and 549
      WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 200 THEN  --# Incentive is capping to 200% achievement ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
            CASE WHEN TARGET*2 <= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN TARGET*2 *50 --# WHEN TARGET*2 <= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN THIS LOGIC ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )  --#
                 WHEN TARGET*2 >= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN DENO_548_549_HIT*50+((TARGET*2 )-DENO_548_549_HIT)*30 --# WHEN TARGET*2 >= DENO_548_549_HIT THEN THIS LOGIC ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )  --#
                 ELSE 0 END
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 100 THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT*50)+(DENO_397_HIT*30)   --# 	 	Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT for Deno 548 and 549, and BDT 30 per hit for Deno 397  ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
     WHEN CLUSTER_NAME !='West Cluster' AND ACH_PER >= 90 THEN (DENO_548_549_HIT*40)+(DENO_397_HIT*20)  --# Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 40 incentives per HIT for Deno 548 and 549, and BDT 20 per hit for Deno 397  ( EXCEPT WEST CLUSTER )--#
     ELSE 0 END AS COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM DENO_WISE_COUNT CC
)
SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 335  Rows 328  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_SS_DET_23_30JUN25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;-- 40,06,870 TAKA

--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA
--# THIS TARGET TABLE WILL BE CREATED BASED ON COMMISSION NAME AND BASE MONTH --#
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_7_12_APR25 AS
select CHANNEL_CODE DD_CODE, TARGET from COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET 
WHERE REPORTCYCLE_ID = (SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS 
where REPORTID = (SELECT REPORTID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 548_549_7th to 12th Apr25') and  
CYCLEID = (SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'));

--drop table TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_7_12_APR25 purge;
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_7_12_APR25;--337  Rows  --# THIS IS TARGET TABLE AFTER CREATING --#
update TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_7_12_APR25 set DD_CODE = trim(DD_CODE);
commit;
SELECT * FROM DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY;
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;

-- STEP 2: AGENT LIST CREATE --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_12APR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_12APR25 AS
SELECT TAR.*,AG.RET_CODE RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN FROM 
TEMP_FOR_DENO_CAMP_TAR_7_12_APR25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.DD_CODE=TAR.DD_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '12-APR-25';--236872  Rows  --# Agent list of 12th Apr’25 will be considered --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_12APR25;-- 556039  Rows
select max(TOP_UP_DATE) from EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;

-- STEP 3: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT_7_12APR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT_7_12APR25 AS   --#THIS THE 1ST DETAIL FOR THIS COMMISSION WHERE COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,AG.TARGET,COUNT(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) HIT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_12APR25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '7-APR-25' AND '12-APR-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (548,549) -- # Effective Date: 7-Apr-2025  End Date: 12-Apr-2025 Deno: 548_549 # --
--    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) 
--    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)
    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT; --43  Rows
,DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((HIT/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--43  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,  TARGET, HIT,ACH_PER,
    CASE 
    WHEN  ACH_PER >= 200 THEN (TARGET*2)*50  --# Incentive is capping to 200% achievement--#
    WHEN  ACH_PER >= 100 THEN HIT*50  --#  Upon achieving Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 50 incentives per HIT 
    WHEN  ACH_PER >= 90 THEN HIT*40 --#  Upon achieving 90% to 99% Deno HIT target (Cumulative of DENO), Distributor will be given BDT 40 incentives per HIT 
    ELSE 0 
    END COMMISSION
    FROM DD_WISE_PERCENTAGE 
)
SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--335  Rows --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT_7_12APR25) --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--16,66,560

-- STEP 4: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT_7_12APR25;--335  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT_7_12APR25;--16,66,560 TK 16,71,790

--# CREATING THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE DATA --#
--drop table TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT2_7_12_APR25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT2_7_12_APR25 AS
WITH DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS ( 
    SELECT AG.DD_CODE,RETAILER_CODE,RET_MSISDN,SUB_MSISDN CUSTOMER_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_12APR25 AG 
    INNER JOIN EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY EV ON EV.RETAILER_MSISDN = AG.RET_MSISDN   
    WHERE (EV.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '7-APR-25' AND '12-APR-25') AND EV.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (548,549) -- # Effective Date: 7-Apr-2025  End Date: 12-Apr-2025 Deno: 548_549 # --
--    AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID NOT IN (141) 
--    AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT MOBILENO FROM VW_EMPLOYEESALESCOM_MONTHLY VE WHERE VE.DATE_DATE='1-JAN-24' AND VE.MOBILENO=EV.SUB_MSISDN)
--    GROUP BY AG.DD_CODE,  AG.TARGET
)
SELECT * FROM DD_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;--12815  Rows
--# OVERLOOKING THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE DATA --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT2_7_12_APR25; --46856  Rows

------------------------SETUP----------------------
--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
 --REPORT_ID : 7985 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 548_549_7th to 12th Apr25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) 
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7745 and  CYCLEID = 9854;--63314

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63314;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63314;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 63314 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT_7_12APR25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63314; -- 1671790 TAKA

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'; --Publish month --9854

 --STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
--EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 548_549_7th to 12th Apr25',9854,'TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT_7_12APR25','SUMMERY_DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_DD_DENO_DAT2_7_12_APR25','MSISDN_DETAIL');
 
 --STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
--EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Distributor Sniper Strike_BDT 548_549_7th to 12th Apr25', 63314,'Apr_25', 'Apr_25',290, 1);

--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA & THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER  --

SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Retailer Deno Campaign BDT 199_227_348_17th to 18th Jan25';
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'; --base month
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7397 and  CYCLEID = 9574;--61417

-- SETP 2: CREATE TEMP TARGET TABLE --
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_TAR_17_18JAN25 AS			--#  THIS TEMP TARGET TABLE HAS ALL DENO MENTION WITH CLUSTERED FILTERED DATA  --#
SELECT CHANNEL_CODE RETAILER_CODE, TARGET FROM COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET where REPORTCYCLE_ID = 61417;

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_TAR_17_18JAN25; --222941  Rows
 
-- STEP 3: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --

-- create table TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL2_17_18JAN25 as		--# CREATE 2ND DETAILS TABLE --#
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL_17_18JAN25 AS			--# CREATE 1ND DETAILS TABLE --#
WITH DENO_WISE_PERTICEPATION AS (
    SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */TAR.CLUSTER_NAME,TAR.RET_MSISDN,TAR.RET_CODE,RECHARGE.SUB_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT,TAR.TARGET,INCENTIVE
    FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_RET_TAR_17_18JAN25 TAR ON TAR.RET_MSISDN = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN AND RECHARGE_AMOUNT=TAR.DENO
    WHERE RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '17-JAN-25' AND '18-JAN-25'		--# TARGET TABLE HAS DENO & CLASTERED FILTERED DATA. SO FILTERATION HAS NOT APPLIED --#
    )
--SELECT * FROM DENO_WISE_PERTICEPATION;--TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL2_17_18JAN25 detail --408  Rows     --# CHECKING 2ND DETAILS TABLE DATA --#
,RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS (
SELECT RET_MSISDN,RET_CODE,TARGET,INCENTIVE,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) ACH
FROM DENO_WISE_PERTICEPATION PER
GROUP BY RET_MSISDN,RET_CODE,TARGET,INCENTIVE
)
--select * from RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;		--# CHECKING 2ND DETAILS TABLE DATA --#
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((ACH/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER
FROM RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--3424  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT RET_MSISDN,RET_CODE,TARGET, ACH,ACH_PER,INCENTIVE,
									--# THIS CONDITION IS ADDED BEACAUSE ONLY 100% ACHIEVEMNT WILL BE COUNT --#
    CASE
        WHEN ACH_PER>=100 THEN INCENTIVE
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE ACHIEVEMENT
)

-- STEP 3: VERIFYING CREATED TABLE DATA

SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--940  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--10008 TAKA

SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL_17_18JAN25;--10008 TK

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL_17_18JAN25; --4088  Rows


--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 4: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Retailer Deno Campaign BDT 199_227_348_17th to 18th Jan25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) --
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7397 and  CYCLEID = 9574;--61417

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61417;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61417;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 61417 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, RET_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL_17_18JAN25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61417; -- 2831 TAKA

 --PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'; --Publish month 9954
 
--STEP 5: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Retailer Deno Campaign BDT 199_227_348_17th to 18th Jan25',9574,'TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL_17_18JAN25','SUMMERY DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL2_17_18JAN25','MSISDN DETAIL'); 
 
--STEP : FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Retailer Deno Campaign BDT 199_227_348_17th to 18th Jan25', 61417,'Jan_25', 'Jan_25',290, 1);

--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA & THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER  --

SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Retailer Deno Campaign BDT 348_14th to 16th Jan25';
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'; --base month
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7364 and  CYCLEID = 9574;--61272

-- SETP 2: CREATE TEMP TARGET TABLE --
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_TAR_14_16JAN25 AS
SELECT CHANNEL_CODE RETAILER_CODE, TARGET FROM COM_KPI_CONDITION_TARGET where REPORTCYCLE_ID = 61272;

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_TAR_14_16JAN25; --2,22,058  Rows
 
-- STEP 3: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --

CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_16_JAN25 AS		--# THIS TEMP TABLE HAS FILTERED AGENT LIST BASED ON SRF --#
SELECT TAR.*, AG.RET_MOBILE RET_MSISDN 
FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_TAR_14_16JAN25 TAR 
INNER JOIN DD_RSO_RET_MAPPING_DAILY AG ON AG.RET_CODE=TAR.RETAILER_CODE AND AG.DATA_DATE = '16-JAN-25';--569264  Rows  --# AGENT LIST OF 16-JAN-25 USED BASED ON SRF --#

select * from TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_16_JAN25; --222155  Rows

create table TEMP_FOR_EV_DET_14_16JAN25 AS
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY WHERE TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '14-JAN-25' AND '16-JAN-25';

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_EV_DET_14_16JAN25 WHERE RECHARGE_AMOUNT=348; --5643488  Rows

--create table TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL2_14_16JAN25 as		--# CREATE 2ND DETAILS TABLE --#	
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL_14_16JAN25 AS		--# CREATE 1ND DETAILS TABLE --#
WITH DENO_WISE_PERTICEPATION AS (
    SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */TAR.RET_MSISDN,TAR.RETAILER_CODE,RECHARGE.SUB_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT,TAR.TARGET
    FROM TEMP_FOR_EV_DET_14_16JAN25 RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_AG_LIST_MAP_16_JAN25 TAR ON TAR.RET_MSISDN = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '14-JAN-25' AND '16-JAN-25'		 --# THIS FILTER IS ADDED ACCORDING TO SRF --#
    AND RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (348)			 --# THIS FILTER IS ADDED ACCORDING TO SRF --#
    )
--SELECT * FROM DENO_WISE_PERTICEPATION;--TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL2_14_16JAN25 detail --408  Rows		 --# CHECKING 2NDTABLE DATA --#
,RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS (
SELECT RET_MSISDN,RETAILER_CODE,TARGET,SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) ACH
FROM DENO_WISE_PERTICEPATION PER
GROUP BY RET_MSISDN,RETAILER_CODE,TARGET
)
--select * from RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT;
,RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE AS (
SELECT ACHIEVEMENT.*,ROUND((ACH/TARGET)*100) ACH_PER		--# THIS ROUNDING IS ADDED BASED ON SRF --#
FROM RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT ACHIEVEMENT
)
--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE;--3424  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT RET_MSISDN,RETAILER_CODE,TARGET, ACH,ACH_PER,
    CASE
							--# THIS CONDITION IS ADDED BEACAUSE ONLY 100% ACHIEVEMNT WILL BE COUNT --#
        WHEN ACH_PER>=100 THEN 100
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_PERCENTAGE ACHIEVEMENT
)

-- STEP 4: VERIFYING CREATED TABLE DATA

SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--940  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;--0 TAKA

SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL_14_16JAN25;--0 TK

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL_14_16JAN25; --940  Rows





--STEP 4: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Retailer Deno Campaign BDT 348_14th to 16th Jan25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) --
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7364 and  CYCLEID = 9574;--61272

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61272;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61272;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 61272 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, RETAILER_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL_14_16JAN25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 61272; -- 187650 TAKA

 --PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Jan_25'; --base month
 
--STEP 5: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Retailer Deno Campaign BDT 348_14th to 16th Jan25',9574,'TEMP_FOR_RET_COM_CAL_14_16JAN25','SUMMERY DETAIL')
 
--STEP : FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Retailer Deno Campaign BDT 348_14th to 16th Jan25', 61272,'Jan_25', 'Jan_25',290, 1);

--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA & THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER  --

select * from agent_list_daily;  --# This table has agent list --#


-- STEP 2: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --

--drop table TEMP_FOR_RETAGENT_15MAY25_ purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RETAGENT_15MAY25_ AS		--# 	CREATED TEMP TABLE FOR HOLDING FILTER DATA RETAILER INFO  ACCORDING TO SRF 	--#
SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ DISTINCT
      MAPING.RETAILER_CODE,
      MAPING.TOPUP_MSISDN
FROM agent_list_daily MAPING
WHERE DATA_DATE='15-MAY-25'; -- 84661  Rows		--#  USED AGENT LIST OF  15-MAY-25 ACCORDING TO SRF --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RETAGENT_15MAY25_;-- 608572  Rows   

--drop table TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_15MAY25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_15MAY25 AS 		--# THIS IS TEMP TABLE FOR HOLDING RECHARGE DATA FROM ACCORDING TO SRF AS EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY TABLE IS LARGE --#
select * from EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY RECHARGE
WHERE RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '15-MAY-25' AND '15-MAY-25'			--# DATAFILTERED ACCORDING TO SRF --#
AND RECHARGE.TOP_UP_TIME BETWEEN '05:00:00' AND '22:00:00'; -- 1530400  Rows	--# DATA FILTERED ACCORDING TO SRF --#
select * from TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_15MAY25; -- 1530400  Rows

--drop table TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_15MAY25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_15MAY25 AS		--#  CREATED 1ST DETAILS TEMP TABLE FOR HOLDING FILTER DATA RECHARGE WITH RETAILER INFO  ACCORDING TO SRF 	--#
WITH RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS (
    SELECT AG.RETAILER_CODE,RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN,SUM(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT) ACH
    FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_15MAY25 RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_RETAGENT_15MAY25_ AG ON AG.TOPUP_MSISDN = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (209)				--# DATA FILTERED ACCORDING TO SRF --#
    GROUP BY AG.RETAILER_CODE,RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
)

--SELECT * FROM RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT; -- 1951  Rows
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT RETAILER_CODE,RETAILER_MSISDN,418 TARGET,ACH,
			--# HERE THIS BLOCK IS ADDED AS SRF MENTIONED 
									--	 Upon achieving Recharge target (418) with the selected denos, Retailer will be given Tk10 incentive for each 209 from the 2nd recharge onwards.  --#
    CASE
        WHEN ACH>= 418 THEN 10
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT
)

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET2_15MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET2_15MAY25 AS		--#  CREATED 2ST DETAILS TEMP TABLE FOR HOLDING FILTER DATA  ACCORDING TO SRF 	--#
 SELECT AG.RETAILER_CODE,RETAILER_MSISDN RET_MOBILE,RECHARGE.SUB_MSISDN,RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT,RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_15MAY25 RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_RETAGENT_15MAY25_ AG ON AG.TOPUP_MSISDN = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (209);-- 2039  Rows 		--# THIS DATE RANGE AND "Deno: 209" IS MENTION IN SRF --#

-- STEP 3: VERIFYING CREATED TABLE DATA

SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 1951  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 850

SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_15MAY25;-- 850 TK

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_15MAY25; -- 1951  Rows


    
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET2_15MAY25;-- 2039  Rows
    
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;



--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 4: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Retailer Deno Campaign_15th May25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) --
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7842 and  CYCLEID = 9954;--63794

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63794;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63794;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 63794 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, RETAILER_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_15MAY25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63794; -- 2831 TAKA

 --PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --Publish month 9954
 
--STEP 5: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Retailer Deno Campaign_15th May25',9954,'TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_15MAY25','SUMMERY DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET2_1_5MAY25','MSISDN DETAIL');
 
--STEP : FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Retailer Deno Campaign_15th May25', 63794,'May_25', 'May_25',290, 1);

--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA & THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER  --

select * from agent_list_daily;  --# This table has agent list --#
select * from TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_1_5MAY25;-- 8247767  Rows --# THIS TABLE IS TEMP TABLE FOR EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY FOR FOR MAY 1 TO 5 AS THE EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY TABLE IS VERY BIG --#

SELECT * FROM RETAILERTYPE@DEALER RD			--# THIS DMS TABLE HAS ALL RETAILER INFO --#
Where RD.NAME in ('BL FRANCHISE STORE','ENTERPRISE','SME DIRECT BDO'); --- 26,29,31 	--#  THIS CONDITION FOR FINDING RETAILER TYPE TO EXCLUDE --#

-- STEP 2: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --

--drop table TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_1_5MAY25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_1_5MAY25 AS   --# THIS IS TEMP TABLE FOR HOLDING RECHARGE DATA FROM ACCORDING TO SRF AS EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY TABLE IS LARGE --#
select * from EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY RECHARGE WHERE 
        RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '1-MAY-25' AND '5-MAY-25'; -- 8247767  Rows        

--drop table TEMP_FOR_RETAGENT_1_5MAY25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RETAGENT_1_5MAY25 AS    	--# 	CREATED TEMP TABLE FOR HOLDING FILTER DATA RECHARGE WITH RETAILER INFO  ACCORDING TO SRF 	--#
SELECT /*+ parallel(10) */ DISTINCT
      MAPING.RETAILER_CODE,
      MAPING.TOPUP_MSISDN RET_MSISDN,
      MAPING.RETAILERTYPE
FROM agent_list_daily MAPING
INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_1_5MAY25 EVR ON MAPING.TOPUP_MSISDN=EVR.RETAILER_MSISDN
WHERE DATA_DATE='5-MAY-25'										--#  USED AGENT LIST OF  5-MAY-25 ACCORDING TO SRF --#
AND MAPING.RETAILERTYPE not in (26,29,31);  --- 278732  Rows  --# EXCLUDED TYPE MENTION ON SRF --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RETAGENT_1_5MAY25;-- 278732  Rows  --# CHECKING CREATED TEMP TABLE DATA --#
--1915273989  87                          


--drop table TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_1_5MAY25 purge;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_1_5MAY25 AS          --# THIS IS 1ST TEMP DETAILS TABLE ACCORDING TO SRF --#
WITH RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT AS (
    SELECT AG.RETAILER_CODE,AG.RET_MSISDN,COUNT(RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT) ACH,RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT
    FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_1_5MAY25 RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_RETAGENT_1_5MAY25 AG 
        ON AG.RET_MSISDN = RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '1-MAY-25' AND '5-MAY-25'        --# THIS DATE RANGE IS MENTION IN SRF --#
        AND RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (32,74,79)						--# THIS CONDITION ADDED AS SRF HAS THIS "Deno: 32, 74, 79" MENTION --#
    GROUP BY AG.RETAILER_CODE, AG.RET_MSISDN,RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT
)
,CALCULATE_COMMISSION AS (
    SELECT RETAILER_CODE, RET_MSISDN,ACH,
    CASE						--# HERE THIS BLOCK IS ADDED AS SRF MENTIONED 
									--	Upon achieving Recharge 3 hit target with any of the selected denos, Retailer will be given BDT 1 for each BDT 32 & BDT74 recharge & BDT 2 for each BDT 79 recharge. --#
        WHEN ACH>=3 AND RECHARGE_AMOUNT in (32,74) THEN ACH*1      		
        WHEN ACH>=3 AND RECHARGE_AMOUNT in (79) THEN ACH*2
        ELSE 0
    END COMMISSION
    FROM RET_WISE_ACHIEVEMENT	
)

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET2_1_5MAY25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET2_1_5MAY25 AS 		--# THIS IS 2ST TEMP DETAILS TABLE ACCORDING TO SRF  --#
 SELECT AG.RETAILER_CODE, RETAILER_MSISDN,RECHARGE.SUB_MSISDN,RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT,RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE
    FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_EV_DET_1_5MAY25 RECHARGE
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_RETAGENT_1_5MAY25 AG 
    ON AG.RET_MSISDN=RECHARGE.RETAILER_MSISDN
    WHERE (RECHARGE.TOP_UP_DATE  BETWEEN '1-MAY-25' AND '5-MAY-25') AND RECHARGE.RECHARGE_AMOUNT IN (32,74,79);-- 28668  Rows  --# THIS DATE RANGE AND "Deno: 32, 74, 79" IS MENTION IN SRF --#

-- STEP 3: VERIFYING CREATED TABLE DATA

SELECT * FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 15377  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) TOTAL_COMMISSION FROM CALCULATE_COMMISSION;-- 2831

SELECT SUM(COMMISSION) FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_1_5MAY25;-- 2831 TK

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_1_5MAY25; -- 24595  Rows
 
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET2_1_5MAY25;-- 28668  Rows
    
SELECT * FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY;


--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 4: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
SELECT * FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Retailer Deno Campaign_1st to 5th May25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --base month
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) --
SELECT CYCLEREPORTID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 7842 and  CYCLEID = 9954;--63794

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM AD_HOC_DATA WHERE REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63794;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63794;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT)
SELECT /*+ parallel(16) */  AD_HOC_DATA_ID.nextval id, 63794 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, RETAILER_CODE, COMMISSION
FROM (
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_1_5MAY25
);
COMMIT;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 63794; -- 2831 TAKA

 --PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'May_25'; --Publish month 9954
 
--STEP 5: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Retailer Deno Campaign_1st to 5th May25',9954,'TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET_1_5MAY25','SUMMERY DETAIL','TEMP_FOR_RET_FCS_DET2_1_5MAY25','MSISDN DETAIL');
 
--STEP : FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Retailer Deno Campaign_1st to 5th May25', 63794,'May_25', 'May_25',290, 1);

sql:
--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA & THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER  --
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_MYBL_HOURLY_31MAR25;--27  Rows; 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_MYBL_HOURLY_31MAR25 PURGE;

SELECT * FROM MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25; --115907  Rows; --# THIS TABLE IS TEMP TABLE FOR EV RECHARGE TABLE FOR MAR 25 AS THE EV RECHARGE TABLE IS VERY BIG --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25; --6063  Rows; --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL HOURLY WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25; --5  Rows; --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL HOURLY, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#

-- STEP 2: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START --
--DROP TABLE MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 AS
SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL ID, RETAILER_MSISDN, SUB_MSISDN, TOP_UP_DATE, TOP_UP_TIME, RECHARGE_AMOUNT, SERVICE_TYPE, REFERENCE_ID
FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY 
WHERE REFERENCE_ID LIKE 'BLAPP%' --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR 6.	For 01967021235, first 5 character of Reference Id will be �BLAPP� (example: �BLAPPXXXXXXXXXX�) --#
AND TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '16-Mar-25' AND '31-Mar-25' --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 16-Mar-2025         End Date: 31-Mar-2025      --#
and SERVICE_CLASS_ID <1000; --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Others: All service class below 1000 --#

select * from MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25;--71730  Rows
ALTER TABLE MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 ADD (COMMISSION_FLAG VARCHAR(50), COMMISSION_AMOUNT NUMBER, REMARKS VARCHAR(50)) ;

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL HOURLY WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL HOURLY, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#
WITH RECHARGE_DETAIL AS
(
    SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ 'Online' DD_CODE,ID, RETAILER_MSISDN RET_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT,COMMISSION,TOP_UP_DATE,TOP_UP_TIME
    FROM MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 EV 
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_MYBL_HOURLY_31MAR25 DL ON RECHARGE_AMOUNT=DENO 
    AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(TOP_UP_DATE, 0,10) || TOP_UP_TIME,  'DD-MON-YY HH24:MI:SS')  BETWEEN TO_DATE(START_DATE,  'DD-MON-YY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(END_DATE,  'DD-MON-YY HH24:MI:SS')
    WHERE RETAILER_MSISDN IN('01967021235') --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE BELOW SRF CONDITION --#
    
    --# 7.	Recharge (retailer to subscriber) must be done from below list of retailer EV MSISDN:
     --   CHANNEL_TYPE	PARTNER_NAMES	RETAILER_MSISDN
     --   Online	BL Self-channels	1967021235 --#
	 
    AND (COMMISSION_FLAG IS NULL OR COMMISSION_FLAG IN ('HOURLY')) --#  THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE 3RD SRF CONDITION (3.	Hourly campaigns will get 2nd highest priority. Transactions of segmented campaigns will not be considered here and transactions of these campaigns will not be considered during calculating commission for regular, and special day campaigns of MyBL App) --#
)
--SELECT * FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL; --6063  Rows; --# CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25) --#
,RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT, COUNT(1) HIT, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION) COMMISSION_AMOUNT
    FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT
)
--SELECT  * FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT; -- 5  Rows; --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25) --#
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT
GROUP BY DD_CODE;

-- STEP 3: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
select * from TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25; --4 Rows
select SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) from TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25;-- 1331801.06 TK

-- STEP 4: MERGE TEMP TABLE OF RECHARGE DATA USING 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR SEPARATING CAMPAIGN WISE TRANSACTIONS 
MERGE INTO MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 T
USING TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25 S
ON (T.ID=S.ID)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET T.COMMISSION_FLAG='HOURLY',
    T.COMMISSION_AMOUNT = S.COMMISSION;
COMMIT;

SELECT COMMISSION_FLAG, COUNT(1),SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 GROUP BY COMMISSION_FLAG;
--# Sample output:
-- "REGULAR"     | XX,XXX   | XXX,XXX.XX
-- "HOURLY"      | 6,063    | 476,868.5 --#

--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID) 
SELECT REPORTID REPORT_ID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Commission for MyBL Hourly_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25';
-- BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID BASE_CYCLE_ID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --# commission end date (BASE_CYCLE/REPORT_MONTH): 31-Mar-2025 ? 'Mar_25' --#
-- REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID) --
SELECT REPORT_CYCLE_ID,* FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 0011 and  CYCLEID = 0022; 

-- CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA --
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--commit;

-- INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA --
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT,AMOUNT_TYPE_ID,AMOUNT)
SELECT AD_HOC_DATA_ID.NEXTVAL ID, 0033 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION_AMOUNT,1,TOTAL_RECHARGE
FROM (
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25
GROUP BY DD_CODE
);
commit;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033; --  476868.5  

--PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044  (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PUBLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'; --PUBLISH_CYCLE(REPORT_PUBLISH_MONTH)

--STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>);
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Commission for MyBL Hourly_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25',0044,'TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_16_31MAR25','Deno Details');

--STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Commission for MyBL Hourly_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25', 0033,'Mar_25', 'Apr_25',290, 1); --# FOLLOW THE BASE_CYCLE & PUBLISH_CYCLE SPECIAL INSTRUCTION HERE ALSO --#

--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------

-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA & THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER --
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_MYBL_HOURLY_31MAR25;-- 28  Rows; --# SUPPORTING DATA FROM SRF UPLOADED IN THIS TABLE --#
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_MYBL_HOURLY_31MAR25 PURGE;

SELECT * FROM MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25;-- 53701375  Rows --# THIS TABLE IS TEMP TABLE FOR EV RECHARGE TABLE FOR MAR 25 AS THE EV RECHAGE TABLE IS VERY BIG --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25;-- 7380  Rows --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL HOURLY PORTONICS WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25;-- 4  Rows --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL HOURLY PORTONICS, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#

----- STEP 2: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START
--DROP TABLE MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 AS
SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL ID, RETAILER_MSISDN, SUB_MSISDN, TOP_UP_DATE, TOP_UP_TIME, RECHARGE_AMOUNT, SERVICE_TYPE, REFERENCE_ID
FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY
WHERE TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN '16-Mar-25' AND '31-Mar-25' --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Effective Date: 16-Mar-2025         End Date: 31-Mar-2025   --#
AND SERVICE_CLASS_ID < 1000; --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR Others: All service class below 1000 --#

select * from MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25;--71730  Rows
ALTER TABLE MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 ADD (COMMISSION_FLAG VARCHAR(50), COMMISSION_AMOUNT NUMBER, REMARKS VARCHAR(50)) ;


--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL HOURLY PORTONICS WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL HOURLY PORTONICS, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#
WITH RECHARGE_DETAIL AS
(
    SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ 'Online' DD_CODE,ID, RETAILER_MSISDN RET_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT,COMMISSION,TOP_UP_DATE
    FROM MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 EV 
    INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_MYBL_HOURLY_31MAR25 DL ON RECHARGE_AMOUNT=DENO 
    AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(TOP_UP_DATE, 0,10) || TOP_UP_TIME,  'DD-MON-YY HH24:MI:SS')  BETWEEN TO_DATE(START_DATE,  'DD-MON-YY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(END_DATE,  'DD-MON-YY HH24:MI:SS')
    WHERE RETAILER_MSISDN='01953348398' --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE BELOW SRF CONDITION  --#

    --# 7.	Recharge (retailer to subscriber) must be done from below list of retailer EV MSISDN:
    --    CHANNEL_TYPE	PARTNER_NAMES	RETAILER_MSISDN
    --    Online	Portonics	01953348398
    --#
    AND (COMMISSION_FLAG IS NULL OR COMMISSION_FLAG IN ('HOURLY')) --#  THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE 3RD SRF CONDITION (3.Hourly campaigns will get 2nd highest priority. Transactions of segmented campaigns will not be considered here and transactions of these campaigns will not be considered during calculating commission for special day and regular campaigns of MyBL App) --#
)
--SELECT * FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL; -- 7380  Rows; --# CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25) --#
,RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT AS (
    SELECT DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT, COUNT(1) HIT, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION) COMMISSION_AMOUNT
    FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT
)
SELECT  * FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT;-- 4  Rows; --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25) --#
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT
GROUP BY DD_CODE;

--STEP 3: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
select * from TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25;-- 4  Rows
select SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) from TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25;-- 1331801.06 TK

--STEP 4: MERGE TEMP TABLE OF RECHARGE DATA USING 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR SEPERATING CAMPAIGN WISE TRANSACTIONS
MERGE INTO MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 T
USING TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25 S
ON (T.ID=S.ID)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET T.COMMISSION_FLAG='HOURLY',
    T.COMMISSION_AMOUNT = S.COMMISSION;
COMMIT;

SELECT COMMISSION_FLAG, COUNT(1),SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 GROUP BY COMMISSION_FLAG;
--# Sample output:
-- "REGULAR"     | XX,XXX   | XXX,XXX.XX
-- "HOURLY"      | 7,380    | 1,331,801.06 --#

--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
SELECT REPORTID REPORT_ID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Commission for MyBL Hourly_Portonics_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25';
--BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID BASE_CYCLE_ID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --# BASE_CYCLE(REPORT_MONTH) -- commission end date (BASE_CYCLE/REPORT_MONTH): 31-Mar-2025 ? 'Mar_25' --#
--REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID)
SELECT REPORT_CYCLE_ID,* FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 0011 and  CYCLEID = 0022; 

--CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--commit;

--INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT,AMOUNT_TYPE_ID,AMOUNT)
SELECT AD_HOC_DATA_ID.NEXTVAL ID, 0033 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION_AMOUNT,1,TOTAL_RECHARGE
FROM (
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25
GROUP BY DD_CODE
);
commit;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033; --  1331801.06  

--PURLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PURLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID PURLISH_CYCLE_ID FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'; --PURLISH_CYCLE(REPORT_PUBLISH_MONTH)


--STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--# PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PURLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>); --#
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Commission for MyBL Hourly_Portonics_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25',0044,'TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_HO_PO_31MAR25','Deno Details');


--STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Commission for MyBL Hourly_Portonics_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25', 0033,'Mar_25', 'Apr_25',290, 1); --# FOLLOW THE BASE_CYCLE & PUBLISH_CYCLE SPECIAL INSTRUCTION HERE ALSO --#

--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------
-- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA & THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER  --
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_MYBL_SPECIAL_31MAR25 PURGE;
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_MYBL_SPECIAL_31MAR25;--81  Rows; --# SUPPORTING DATA FROM SRF UPLOADED IN THIS TABLE --#
SELECT * FROM MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25; --115907  Rows --# THIS TABLE IS TEMP TABLE FOR EV RECHARGE TABLE FOR MAR 25 AS THE EV RECHAGE TABLE IS VERY BIG --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25;--46204  Rows --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL SPECIAL DAY WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
select DISTINCT TOP_UP_DATE from TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25 ORDER BY TOP_UP_DATE ASC; --# VERIFY DATE RANGE COVERAGE --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25;--9  Rows --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL SPECIAL DAY, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#

----- STEP 2: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL SPECIAL DAY WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL SPECIAL DAY, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#
WITH RECHARGE_DETAIL AS
(
SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ 'Online' DD_CODE,ID, RETAILER_MSISDN RET_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT,COMMISSION,TOP_UP_DATE
FROM MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 EV 
INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_MYBL_SPECIAL_31MAR25 DL ON RECHARGE_AMOUNT=DENO 
AND TRUNC(TOP_UP_DATE) BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE
WHERE REFERENCE_ID LIKE 'BLAPP%'  --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR 6.	For 01967021235, first 5 character of Reference Id will be �BLAPP� (example: �BLAPPXXXXXXXXXX�) --#
AND RETAILER_MSISDN IN ('01967021235') --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE BELOW SRF CONDITION  --#

--# 7.	Recharge (retailer to subscriber) must be done from below list of retailer EV MSISDN:
--    CHANNEL_TYPE	PARTNER_NAMES	RETAILER_MSISDN
--    Online	BL Self-channels	01967021235
--#
AND (COMMISSION_FLAG IS NULL OR COMMISSION_FLAG='SPECIAL_DAY') --#  THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE 3RD SRF CONDITION (3.	Special day campaigns will get 3rd highest priority. Transactions of segmented and hourly campaigns will not be considered here and transactions of these campaigns will not be considered during calculating commission for regular campaigns of MyBL App) --#
)
--SELECT * FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL;--46204  Rows; --# CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25) --#
,RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT AS (
    SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUM(COMMISSION) COMMISSION_AMOUNT, COUNT(1) HIT,COUNT(1)*RECHARGE_AMOUNT TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT
)
SELECT  * FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT; --9  Rows; --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25) --#
SELECT SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE),  SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT;
--27633368	6883941.429 TK Total Recharge and Commission Amount

--STEP 3: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25; --9  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25;--3941065.92 TK  

--STEP 4: MERGE TEMP TABLE OF RECHARGE DATA USING 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR SEPERATING CAMPAIGN WISE TRANSACTIONS
MERGE INTO MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 T
USING TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25 S
ON (T.ID=S.ID)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET T.COMMISSION_FLAG='SPECIAL_DAY',
    T.COMMISSION_AMOUNT = S.COMMISSION;
COMMIT;

SELECT * FROM MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 WHERE COMMISSION_FLAG = 'SPECIAL_DAY';

SELECT COMMISSION_FLAG, COUNT(1),SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 GROUP BY COMMISSION_FLAG;
--# Sample output:
-- "REGULAR"     | XX,XXX   | XXX,XXX.XX
-- "SPECIAL_DAY" | 46,204   | 3,941,065.92
-- "HOURLY"      | X,XXX    | XXX,XXX.XX --#

--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
SELECT REPORTID REPORT_ID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Commission for MyBL Special Day_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25';
--BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID BASE_CYCLE_ID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --# BASE_CYCLE(REPORT_MONTH) -- commission end date (BASE_CYCLE/REPORT_MONTH): 31-Mar-2025 = 'Mar_25' --#
--REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID)
SELECT REPORT_CYCLE_ID,* FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 0011 and  CYCLEID = 0022; 

--CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--commit;

--INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT,AMOUNT_TYPE_ID,AMOUNT)
SELECT AD_HOC_DATA_ID.NEXTVAL ID, 0033 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION_AMOUNT,1,TOTAL_RECHARGE
FROM (
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25
GROUP BY DD_CODE
);
commit;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033; --  3941065.92  

--PURLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PURLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID PURLISH_CYCLE_ID FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'; --# PURLISH_CYCLE(REPORT_PUBLISH_MONTH) --#


--STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--# PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PURLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>); --#
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Commission for MyBL Special Day_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25',0044,'TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_16_31MAR25','Deno Details');


--STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Commission for MyBL Special Day_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25', 0033,'Mar_25', 'Apr_25',290, 1--# FOLLOW THE BASE_CYCLE & PUBLISH_CYCLE SPECIAL INSTRUCTION HERE ALSO --#

--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------
----- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA & THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER 
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_MYBL_SP_POT_31MAR25 PURGE;
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_MYBL_SP_POT_31MAR25;-- 81  Rows; --# SUPPORTING DATA FROM SRF UPLOADED IN THIS TABLE --#
SELECT * FROM MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25; -- 53701375  Rows --# THIS TABLE IS TEMP TABLE FOR EV RECHARGE TABLE FOR MAR 25 AS THE EV RECHAGE TABLE IS VERY BIG --#

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25;-- 49021  Rows --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL SPECIAL DAY PORTONICS WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
select DISTINCT TOP_UP_DATE from TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25 ORDER BY TOP_UP_DATE ASC; --# VERIFY DATE RANGE COVERAGE --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25; -- 7  Rows --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL SPECIAL DAY PORTONICS, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#

----- STEP 2: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START


--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL SPECIAL DAY PORTONICS WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL SPECIAL DAY PORTONICS, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#
WITH RECHARGE_DETAIL AS
(
SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ 'Online' DD_CODE,ID, RETAILER_MSISDN RET_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT,COMMISSION,TOP_UP_DATE
FROM MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 EV 
INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_MYBL_SP_POT_31MAR25 DL ON RECHARGE_AMOUNT=DENO 
AND TRUNC(TOP_UP_DATE) BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE
WHERE RETAILER_MSISDN IN ('01953348398') --- THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE BELOW SRF CONDITION 

--# 7.	Recharge (retailer to subscriber) must be done from below list of retailer EV MSISDN:
--     CHANNEL_TYPE	PARTNER_NAMES	RETAILER_MSISDN
--#     Online	Portonics	01953348398

AND (COMMISSION_FLAG IS NULL OR COMMISSION_FLAG='SPECIAL_DAY') --#  THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE 3RD SRF CONDITION (3.Special day campaigns will get 3rd highest priority. Transactions of segmented and hourly campaigns will not be considered here and transactions of these campaigns will not be considered during calculating commission for regular campaigns of MyBL App) --#
)
--SELECT * FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL;-- 49021  Rows; --# CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25) --#
,RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT AS (
    SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUM(COMMISSION) COMMISSION_AMOUNT, COUNT(1) HIT,COUNT(1)*RECHARGE_AMOUNT TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT
)
SELECT  * FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT; -- 7  Rows; --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25) --#
SELECT SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE),  SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT;
-- 35202813 8288307.72 TK Total Recharge and Commission Amount

--STEP 3: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25; -- 7  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25;-- 8288307.72 TK  

--STEP 4: MERGE TEMP TABLE OF RECHARGE DATA USING 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR SEPERATING CAMPAIGN WISE TRANSACTIONS
MERGE INTO MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 T
USING TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25 S
ON (T.ID=S.ID)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET T.COMMISSION_FLAG='SPECIAL_DAY',
    T.COMMISSION_AMOUNT = S.COMMISSION;
COMMIT;

SELECT * FROM MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 WHERE COMMISSION_FLAG = 'SPECIAL_DAY';

SELECT COMMISSION_FLAG, COUNT(1),SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 GROUP BY COMMISSION_FLAG;
--# Sample output:
-- "REGULAR"     | XX,XXX   | XXX,XXX.XX
-- "SPECIAL_DAY" | 49,021   | 8,288,307.72
-- "HOURLY"      | X,XXX    | XXX,XXX.XX --#

--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
SELECT REPORTID REPORT_ID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Commission for MyBL Special Day_Portonics_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25';
--BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID BASE_CYCLE_ID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --BASE_CYCLE(REPORT_MONTH) -- commission end date (BASE_CYCLE/REPORT_MONTH): 31_Mar_2025 ? 'Mar_25'
--REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID)
SELECT REPORT_CYCLE_ID,* FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 0011 and  CYCLEID = 0022; 

--CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--commit;

--INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT,AMOUNT_TYPE_ID,AMOUNT)
SELECT AD_HOC_DATA_ID.NEXTVAL ID, 0033 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION_AMOUNT,1,TOTAL_RECHARGE
FROM (
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(TOTAL_RECHARGE) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25
GROUP BY DD_CODE
);
commit;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033; --  8288307.72  

--PURLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PURLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30_Jun_2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID PURLISH_CYCLE_ID FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'; --PURLISH_CYCLE(REPORT_PUBLISH_MONTH)


--STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--# PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PURLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>); --#
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Commission for MyBL Special Day_Portonics_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25',0044,'TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_SP_POT_16_31MAR25','Deno Details');


--STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Commission for MyBL Special Day_Portonics_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25', 0033,'Mar_25', 'Apr_25',290, 1); --# FOLLOW THE BASE_CYCLE & PUBLISH_CYCLE SPECIAL INSTRUCTION HERE ALSO --#

--------------------------------- REPORT HELPER QUERY -----------------------------------------
----- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA & THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER 
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_MYBL_REG_16_31_MAR25;--57  Rows; --# SUPPORTING DATA FROM SRF UPLOADED IN THIS TABLE --#
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_MYBL_REG_16_31_MAR25 PURGE;

SELECT * FROM MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25; --171730  Rows --# THIS TABLE IS TEMP TABLE FOR EV RECHARGE TABLE FOR MAR 25 AS THE EV RECHAGE TABLE IS VERY BIG --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25; --55067  Rows --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL REGULAR WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25; --22  Rows --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL REGULAR, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25;--1579046.17 TK

----- STEP 2: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL REGULAR WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL REGULAR, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#
WITH RECHARGE_DETAIL AS
(
SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ DISTINCT 'Online' DD_CODE,ID, RETAILER_MSISDN RET_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT,COMMISSION,TOP_UP_DATE
FROM MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25 EV 
INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_MYBL_REG_16_31_MAR25 DL ON RECHARGE_AMOUNT = DENO 
AND TRUNC(TOP_UP_DATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(START_DATE) AND TRUNC(END_DATE)
WHERE RETAILER_MSISDN IN('01967021235') --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE BELOW SRF CONDITION --#
--#
--7.	Recharge (retailer to subscriber) must be done from below list of retailer EV MSISDN:
--    CHANNEL_TYPE	PARTNER_NAMES	RETAILER_MSISDN
--    Online	BL Self-channels	01967021235
--#
AND REFERENCE_ID LIKE 'BLAPP%' --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR 6.	For 01967021235, first 5 character of Reference Id will be �BLAPP� (example: �BLAPPXXXXXXXXXX�) --#
AND (COMMISSION_FLAG IS NULL OR COMMISSION_FLAG='REGULAR') --#  THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE 4TH SRF CONDITION (4.Regular campaigns will get 4th highest priority. Transactions of segmented, hourly and special day campaigns will not be considered here) --#
)
--SELECT * FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL;--38175  Rows; CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25)
,RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT AS (
    SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUM(COMMISSION) COMMISSION_AMOUNT, COUNT(1) HIT,COUNT(1)*RECHARGE_AMOUNT TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT
)
SELECT * FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT;  -- 22  Rows; --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25) --#

SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT
GROUP BY DD_CODE; -- 1098959.02 TK Total Recharge and Commission Amount


--STEP 3: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
select * from TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25;
select SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) from TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25; --713141.55

--STEP 4: MERGE TEMP TABLE OF RECHARGE DATA USING 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR SEPERATING CAMPAIGN WISE TRANSACTIONS
MERGE INTO MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25  T
USING TEMP_FOR_D2_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25 S
ON (T.ID=S.ID)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET T.COMMISSION_FLAG='REGULAR',
    T.COMMISSION_AMOUNT = S.COMMISSION;
COMMIT;

SELECT COMMISSION_FLAG, COUNT(1),SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_16_31MAR25  GROUP BY COMMISSION_FLAG;
--# Sample output:
-- "REGULAR"     | 55,067   | 713,141.55
-- "SPECIAL_DAY" | X,XXX    | XXX,XXX.XX
-- "HOURLY"      | X,XXX    | XXX,XXX.XX --#

--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
SELECT REPORTID REPORT_ID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Commission for MyBL_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25';
--BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID BASE_CYCLE_ID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --BASE_CYCLE(REPORT_MONTH) -- commission end date (BASE_CYCLE/REPORT_MONTH): 31-Mar-2025 ? 'Mar_25'
--REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID)
SELECT REPORT_CYCLE_ID,* FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 0011 and  CYCLEID = 0022; 

--CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--commit;

--INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT,AMOUNT_TYPE_ID,AMOUNT)
SELECT AD_HOC_DATA_ID.NEXTVAL ID, 0033 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION_AMOUNT,1,TOTAL_RECHARGE
FROM (
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25
GROUP BY DD_CODE
);
commit;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033; --  713141.55  

--PURLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PURLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID PURLISH_CYCLE_ID FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'; --PURLISH_CYCLE(REPORT_PUBLISH_MONTH)


--STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--# PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PURLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>); --#
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Commission for MyBL_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25',0044,'TEMP_FOR_D1_MYBL_RE_16_31MAR25','Deno Details');


--STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Commission for MyBL_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25', 0033,'Mar_25', 'Apr_25',290, 1); --# FOLLOW THE BASE_CYCLE & PUBLISH_CYCLE SPECIAL INSTRUCTION HERE ALSO --#

WITH RECHARGE_DETAIL AS
(
SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ DISTINCT 'Online' DD_CODE,ID, RETAILER_MSISDN RET_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT,COMMISSION,TOP_UP_DATE
FROM MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25 EV 
INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_MYBL_RPOT_16_31_MAR25 DL ON RECHARGE_AMOUNT = DENO 
AND TRUNC(TOP_UP_DATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(START_DATE) AND TRUNC(END_DATE)
WHERE RETAILER_MSISDN IN('01953348398') --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE BELOW SRF CONDITION  --#

--#

)
SELECT * FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL;-- 37747  Rows; --# CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DET2_MYBL_POT16_31MAR25) --#
,RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT AS (
    SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT,SUM(COMMISSION) COMMISSION_AMOUNT, COUNT(1) HIT,COUNT(1)*RECHARGE_AMOUNT TOTAL_RECHARGE
    FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT
)
