--STEP 4: MERGE TEMP TABLE OF RECHARGE DATA USING 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR SEPERATING CAMPAIGN WISE TRANSACTIONS
MERGE INTO MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25  T
USING TEMP_FOR_DET2_MYBL_POT16_31MAR25 S
ON (T.ID=S.ID)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET T.COMMISSION_FLAG='REGULAR',
    T.COMMISSION_AMOUNT = S.COMMISSION;
COMMIT;

SELECT COMMISSION_FLAG, COUNT(1),SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM MY_BL_POT_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_31MAR25  GROUP BY COMMISSION_FLAG;
-- Sample output:
-- "REGULAR"     | 37,747   | 1,464,765.1
-- "SPECIAL_DAY" | X,XXX    | XXX,XXX.XX
-- "HOURLY"      | X,XXX    | XXX,XXX.XX

--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
SELECT REPORTID REPORT_ID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Commission for MyBL_Portonics_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25';
--BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID BASE_CYCLE_ID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25';  --# BASE_CYCLE(REPORT_MONTH) -- commission end date (BASE_CYCLE/REPORT_MONTH): 31-Mar-2025 ? 'Mar_25' --#
--REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID)
SELECT REPORT_CYCLE_ID,* FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 0011 and  CYCLEID = 0022; 

--CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--commit;

--INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT,AMOUNT_TYPE_ID,AMOUNT)
SELECT AD_HOC_DATA_ID.NEXTVAL ID, 0033 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION_AMOUNT,1,TOTAL_RECHARGE
FROM (
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYBL_POT16_31MAR25
GROUP BY DD_CODE
);
commit;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033; --  1464765.1  

--PURLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PURLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID PURLISH_CYCLE_ID FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'; --PURLISH_CYCLE(REPORT_PUBLISH_MONTH)


--STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--# PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PURLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>); --#
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Commission for MyBL_Portonics_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25',0044,'TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYBL_POT16_31MAR25','Deno Details');


--STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Commission for MyBL_Portonics_16th Mar25 to 31st Mar25', 0033,'Mar_25', 'Apr_25',290, 1); --# FOLLOW THE BASE_CYCLE & PUBLISH_CYCLE SPECIAL INSTRUCTION HERE ALSO --#

----- STEP 1: VERIFY SUPPORTING DATA & THIS TABLE IS ALREADY EXISTING, NO NEED TO CREATE FURTHER 
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_MYBL_SSL_REG_01_31_MAR25;--30  Rows; --# SUPPORTING DATA FROM SRF UPLOADED IN THIS TABLE --#
--DROP TABLE MY_BL_POSTO_REC_MON_31MAR25 PURGE;

--SELECT DISTINCT REFERENCE_ID FROM MY_BL_POSTO_REC_MON_31MAR25;--401643  Rows --# THIS TABLE IS TEMP TABLE FOR EV RECHARGE TABLE FOR MAR 25 AS THE EV RECHAGE TABLE IS VERY BIG --#

----- STEP 2: COMMISSION CALCULATION QUERY START
CREATE TABLE MY_BL_POSTO_REC_MON_31MAR25 AS
SELECT MY_BL_RECHARGE_MONTHLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL ID, RETAILER_MSISDN, SUB_MSISDN, TOP_UP_DATE, TOP_UP_TIME,SERVICE_CLASS_ID, RECHARGE_AMOUNT, SERVICE_TYPE, REFERENCE_ID
FROM EV_RECHARGE_COM_DAILY
WHERE TOP_UP_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-2)))+1 AND TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1)))
and SERVICE_CLASS_ID >= 1000 --# THIS IS FOR Others: All service class equal or above  1000 SRF LOGIC --#
;

SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DET2_MYBL_SSL_01_30NOV24;--478  Rows --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL PORTONICS POSTPAID WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_POR_01_31MAR25; --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL PORTONICS POSTPAID, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#

--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DET2_MYBL_SSL_01_30NOV24 PURGE;
--CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DET2_MYBL_SSL_01_30NOV24 AS --# THIS IS 2ND DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL PORTONICS POSTPAID WHERE WE KEEP FLAG WISE DATA --#
--DROP TABLE TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_POR_01_31MAR25 PURGE;
CREATE TABLE TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_POR_01_31MAR25 AS --# THIS IS 1ST DETAILS TABLE FOR MYBL PORTONICS POSTPAID, COMMISSION AMOUNT IS CALCULATED IN THIS TABLE --#
WITH RECHARGE_DETAIL AS
(
SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ DISTINCT 'Online' DD_CODE,ID, RETAILER_MSISDN RET_MSISDN,RECHARGE_AMOUNT,COMMISSION,TOP_UP_DATE
FROM MY_BL_POSTO_REC_MON_31MAR25 EV 
INNER JOIN TEMP_FOR_MYBL_SSL_REG_01_31_MAR25 DL ON RECHARGE_AMOUNT = DENO 
AND TRUNC(TOP_UP_DATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(START_DATE) AND TRUNC(END_DATE)
WHERE RETAILER_MSISDN='01953348398' --# THIS LOGIC IS FOR THE BELOW SRF CONDITION --#
--#
--7.	Recharge (retailer to subscriber) must be done from below list of retailer EV MSISDN:
--     CHANNEL_TYPE	PARTNER_NAMES	RETAILER_MSISDN
--     Online	Portonics	01953348398
--#
)
--SELECT * FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL;--665  Rows; --# CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DET2_MYBL_SSL_01_30NOV24) --#
,RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT AS (
    SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT, COUNT(1) HIT,COUNT(1)*RECHARGE_AMOUNT TOTAL_RECHARGE,SUM(COMMISSION) COMMISSION_AMOUNT
    FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT
)
SELECT * FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT;  -- 4  Rows; --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_POR_01_31MAR25) --#
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT
GROUP BY DD_CODE; --34230.01 TK Total Recharge and Commission Amount

--STEP 3: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_POR_01_31MAR25;--16  Rows
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_POR_01_31MAR25;--245790.83 TK

--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
SELECT REPORTID REPORT_ID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Commission for MyBL_Portonics_1st Mar25 to 31st Mar25_Postpaid';
--BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL BASE CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID BASE_CYCLE_ID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --# BASE_CYCLE(REPORT_MONTH) -- commission end date (BASE_CYCLE/REPORT_MONTH): 31-Mar-2025 ? 'Mar_25' --#
--REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID)
SELECT REPORT_CYCLE_ID,* FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 0011 and  CYCLEID = 0022; 

--CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--commit;

--INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT,AMOUNT_TYPE_ID,AMOUNT)
SELECT AD_HOC_DATA_ID.NEXTVAL ID, 0033 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION_AMOUNT,1,TOTAL_RECHARGE
FROM (
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_POR_01_31MAR25
GROUP BY DD_CODE
);
commit;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033; --  245790.83  

--PURLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PURLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID PURLISH_CYCLE_ID FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'; --PURLISH_CYCLE(REPORT_PUBLISH_MONTH)


--STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM
--# PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP(<REPORT_TITLE>, <PURLISH_CYCLE_ID>, <DETAIL1>, <LEVEL1>, ..., <DETAIL9>, <LEVEL9>); --#
EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Commission for MyBL_Portonics_1st Mar25 to 31st Mar25_Postpaid',0044,'TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_POR_01_31MAR25','Deno Details');


--STEP 7: FINALIZE AND PUBLISH COMMISSION REPORT
--# FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC(<REPORT_NAME>, <REPORT_CYCLE_ID>, <BASE_CYCLE>, <PUBLISH_CYCLE>, <APPROVAL_FLOW_ID>, <PUBLISH_TYPE>) --#
EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Commission for MyBL_Portonics_1st Mar25 to 31st Mar25_Postpaid', 0033,'Mar_25', 'Apr_25',290, 1); --# FOLLOW THE BASE_CYCLE & PUBLISH_CYCLE SPECIAL INSTRUCTION HERE ALSO --#

--SELECT * FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL;--665  Rows; --# CREATE THE 2ND DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DET2_MYBL_SSL_01_30NOV24) --#
,RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT AS (
    SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(10)*/ DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT, COUNT(1) HIT,COUNT(1)*RECHARGE_AMOUNT TOTAL_RECHARGE,SUM(COMMISSION) COMMISSION_AMOUNT
    FROM RECHARGE_DETAIL
    GROUP BY DD_CODE,RET_MSISDN, RECHARGE_AMOUNT
)
SELECT * FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT;  -- 4  Rows; --# CREATE THE 1ST DETAILS TABLE FROM HERE (TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_SSLL_01_31MAR25) --#
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM RETAILER_WISE_HIT_COUNT
GROUP BY DD_CODE; --34230.01 TK Total Recharge and Commission Amount

--STEP 3: OVERLOOKING CREATED TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_SSLL_01_31MAR25;
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_SSLL_01_31MAR25;--128603.72 TK

--------------------------------- REPORT SETUP QUERY -----------------------------------------

--STEP 5: PREPARE FOR REPORT PUBLISHING
--REPORT_ID : 0011 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
SELECT REPORTID REPORT_ID FROM COMMISSIONREPORT WHERE REPORTNAME = 'Commission for MyBL_SSL_1st Mar25 to 31st Mar25_Postpaid';
--BASE_CYCLE_ID : 0022 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : BASE_CYCLE = month of commission END DATE (Mar_25) --#
SELECT CYCLEID BASE_CYCLE_ID  FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Mar_25'; --# BASE_CYCLE(REPORT_MONTH) -- commission end date (BASE_CYCLE/REPORT_MONTH): 31-Mar-2025 ? 'Mar_25' --#
--REPORT_CYCLE_ID : 0033 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL REPORT CYCLE ID)
SELECT REPORT_CYCLE_ID,* FROM COMMISSIONCYCLEREPORTS where REPORTID = 0011 and  CYCLEID = 0022; 

--CHECK ADHOC TABLE DATA
SELECT * FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--delete from ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033;
--commit;

--INSERT THE CHANNEL WISE CALCULATED COMMISSION DATA
INSERT INTO AD_HOC_DATA (ID, REPORT_CYCLE_ID, CHANNEL_CODE,COMMISSION_AMOUNT,AMOUNT_TYPE_ID,AMOUNT)
SELECT AD_HOC_DATA_ID.NEXTVAL ID, 0033 REPORT_CYCLE_ID, DD_CODE, COMMISSION_AMOUNT,1,TOTAL_RECHARGE
FROM (
SELECT DD_CODE, SUM(RECHARGE_AMOUNT*HIT) TOTAL_RECHARGE, SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT)  COMMISSION_AMOUNT
FROM TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_SSLL_01_31MAR25
GROUP BY DD_CODE
);
commit;

--CHECK SUM OF COMMISSION AMOUNT
SELECT SUM(COMMISSION_AMOUNT) FROM ad_hoc_data where REPORT_CYCLE_ID = 0033; --  128603.72  

--PURLISH_CYCLE_ID : 0044 (UPDATE WITH ACTUAL PURLISH CYCLE ID)
--# SPECIAL INSTRUCTION : PUBLISH_CYCLE = current sysdate month (e.g. Jun_25 if today = 30-Jun-2025) --#
SELECT CYCLEID PURLISH_CYCLE_ID FROM COMMISSIONCYCLE WHERE CYCLEDESCRIPTION = 'Apr_25'; --PURLISH_CYCLE(REPORT_PUBLISH_MONTH)


--STEP 6: SET UP COMMISSION DETAILS IN COMMISSION PLATFORM

EXEC PROC_COMMISSION_DETAIL_SETUP('Commission for MyBL_SSL_1st Mar25 to 31st Mar25_Postpaid',0044,'TEMP_FOR_DET1_MYB_SSLL_01_31MAR25','Deno Details');

EXEC FINALIZE_REPORT_ADHOC('Commission for MyBL_SSL_1st Mar25 to 31st Mar25_Postpaid', 0033,'Mar_25', 'Apr_25',290, 1); --# FOLLOW THE BASE_CYCLE & PUBLISH_CYCLE SPECIAL INSTRUCTION HERE ALSO --#
